People can now even find their name in the district wise ration card list for below poverty line (BPL) / Antyodaya beneficiaries.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

NFSA / BPL Ration Card in Haryana is an essential document for the APL / BPL people to take benefits of most govt. schemes. It is important to note that ration card holders only can purchase Ration at subsidized rates from Ration Shops located nearby. Moreover, ration card holders can only take benefits of National Food Security Scheme – NFSA (AAY + PHH).
Haryana Ration Card List 2020 District Wise Download (Find Name)


All the candidates who had previously applied for the new ration card now check their name in Haryana new ration card list 2020 for NFSA beneficiaries as per the procedure below:-


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});


Total Time: 9 minutes


Visit official website
Firstly visit the official website of dept. of food and civil supplies at hr.epds.nic.in/HRY/epds



Click MIS & Reports Link
At the homepage, click at “MIS & Reports” section and then click at “Reports” option to open the Haryana ration card list online find page as shown below.



Click at Ration Card link to open DFSO wise RC Details
Here candidates can choose the “Ration Card” option to open DFSO wise EPDS Haryana Ration Card List (Haryana NFSA Ration Card List) as shown below.



Open AFSO Wise Ration Card List
Here click at the “DFSO Name” to open the AFSO wise Haryana ration card list 2020.



Open FPS Wise Ration Card Report
Now click at the link under AFSO Name section as in the previous step to open the APL / BPL Ration Card List Haryana 2020 as shown below.



Check Ration Card HOF Wise Report
Now click at the “FPS ID” to open the Haryana new ration card list (Head of Family Wise).



Open Haryana Ration Card List District Wise
Finally click at the “View” button to open the Haryana Ration Card List district wise as shown below.




People can take a printout of the Ration Card after finding their name online in the Haryana Ration Card List of beneficiaries.
Haryana Ration Card Online Registration at Antyodaya Saral Portal
The citizens of Haryana whose name is not present in the Ration Card List can apply online for new ration card at the official website. Here is the complete process to fill registration form for name inclusion in Haryana RC Holder list:-
Visit the official website at saralharyana.gov.inAt the homepage, click at the “New User? Register Here” link under ‘Sign In Here’ section:-

Ration Card Haryana Registration Antyodaya Saral Portal
Afterwards, the Haryana Ration Card online registration form 2020 will appear as shown below:-

Haryana Ration Card Online Registration Form
Here enter all the necessary details, click at the Submit button to complete the registration process for ration card in Haryana.
Then candidates can make login using their Login Id and Password.
Haryana Ration Card Online Application Form at Antyodaya Saral Portal
Using the Login Id and password, people can make login at the Antyodaya Saral Haryana portal. At the dashboard, click at the “Apply For Services” link and then click at “View All Available Services” link. Then you can type ration card in the search box to avail the following services as follows:-
Add New Member in Ration Card
To add a new member in ration card of Haryana, check the application form:-
Add New Member Ration Card Haryana
Delete Member in Ration Card
To delete an existing member in ration card, check the online application form here:-
Delete Member Ration Card Haryana
Issuance of Duplicate Ration Card
To issue a duplicate ration card, check the apply online form here:-
Haryana Duplicate Ration Card Issuance Form
Issuance of New Ration Card on Receipt of D1 Form
For issuing a new ration card upon receipt of D1 form, check the online application form here:-
Haryana New Ration Card Online Application Form
Modify Member Details in Ration Card
For modification of member details in Ration Card of Haryana, check apply online form:-
Modification Member Details Ration Card Haryana
Surrender Ration Card
To surrender your ration card, check online application form here:-
Surrender Ration Card Apply Form Haryana
Transfer Ration Card
To transfer your ration card, check apply online form here:-
Transfer Ration Card Apply Form Haryana
How to Download Haryana Ration Card Apply Form PDF
People can now download the Haryana ration card application form in PDF format through the link given below:-Haryana Ration Card Application Form PDF Download
Application Fees
There is no application form filling fee and there is no requirement to pay any fees while applying online for new ration card in Haryana. However, applicants can collect their ration cards from the concerned authorities on making a payment of Rs. 5 per copy.
Timelines for Issuing Ration Card in Haryana
All the applicants can submit the complete Haryana Ration Card online application form and new ration cards would be issued within 15 days of submission of application. However in certain cases, 1 month time is required to issue a new ration card.
Linking of Aadhaar Card with Ration Card
People can now link their Unique Identification Number or Aadhaar Card with their ration card. This can be done online by visiting the official portal and then clicking at the “Link to UID” link.
What is the Eligibility Criteria for Haryana Ration Card
All the applicants must meet the basic eligibility criteria to get a new ration card in Haryana:-a) Applicants who are permanent resident of Haryana can apply.b) Households not already having ration card in the state are eligible.c) Newly married couples can apply for new ration card.d) Citizens having temporary ration cards whose date has been expired are eligible.
It is important to note that the issue of new ration card in Haryana would be based on the household income as well as economic conditions of the family.
List of Documents Required for New Ration Card in Haryana
Below is the complete list of documents required to apply online for new ration card in Haryana:-
Residential proof such as Voter ID, Driving License, Aadhaar Card (Scanned Copy)Age Certificate (Scanned Copy)Caste Certificate (Scanned Copy)Identity Proof like Voter ID, PAN Card, Driving Licence, Aadhar Card (Scanned Copy)Income proof of the family (Scanned Copy)Recent Passport Size Photograph of the applicantValid Mobile Number / E-mail IDPrevious Electricity BillsBank PassbookGas Connection DetailsSelf Declaration and Certificate issued by Ward Councillor/ PradhanTenancy Agreement (if applicable)
In case of non-possession of above mentioned documents, applications for new ration cards are liable to get rejected.
An Overview of Haryana Ration Card
Here is an overview of Haryana Ration Card which is mentioned in the table below:-
Service TypeRation CardState NameHaryanaArticle CategoryList / Status / Application FormConcerned DepartmentFood, Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Department, Govt. of HaryanaApplicable Year2020Mode of Checking Status / List / ApplicationOnlineOfficial Portalhttp://hr.epds.nic.in/HRY/epds#, https://haryanafood.gov.in/en-us/
Helpline Number (Toll Free) for Haryana Ration Card
People can now contact the Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs Department, Haryana. The helpline number for Haryana Ration Card is 1967 while toll free contact is 1800-180-2087. For more details, visit the official website at haryanafood.gov.in

title: हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की अंपगता सहायता योजना 2019 ऑनलाइन पंजीकरण / आवेदन पत्र आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर उपलब्ध हैं, पंजीकृत कामगार की कार्य स्थल पर किसी दुर्घटना में स्थाई रूप से अपंग होने पर अपंगता प्रतिशतता के आधार पर 1.5 लाख से 3 लाख तक की एक मुश्त वित्तीय सहायता दी जाती है, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें
full_text:
हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की अंपगता सहायता योजना 2019 ऑनलाइन पंजीकरण / आवेदन पत्र आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर उपलब्ध हैं, पंजीकृत कामगार की कार्य स्थल पर किसी दुर्घटना में स्थाई रूप से अपंग होने पर अपंगता प्रतिशतता के आधार पर 1.5 लाख से 3 लाख तक की एक मुश्त वित्तीय सहायता दी जाती है, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें

Table of Contents

Haryana Labour Disability Assistance Scheme 2019Haryana Labour Department Disability Assistance Scheme Form OnlineHaryana Labour Welfare Board Disability Assistance Scheme EligibilityHaryana Labour Department Disability Assistance Scheme Conditions
The labour department of Haryana has launched Disability Assistance Scheme for persons with disability (PWDs). Under this Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Handicap (Viklang Jan) Assistance Scheme, labor dept. provides financial assistance to disabled persons. Interested unorganized sector labourers can avail financial aid of Rs. 1.5 lakh to Rs 3 lakh by filling Labour Welfare Board Handicapped Assistance Scheme online application form at hrylabour.gov.in
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Disability Assistance Scheme for disabled persons is going to assist laborers in their hour of need. Haryana Labour Handicap Assistance Scheme is applicable for all the registered labourers who got permanently disabled due to accident at work site.
All the building and construction workers (BOCW) can now apply online for Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Handicapped Assistance Scheme and fill Haryana Labour Disabled Assistance Scheme online registration / application form.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Labour Disability Assistance Scheme 2019
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Disability Assistance Scheme 2019 aims to provide financial assistance of Rs. 1.5 lakh to 3 lakh to the registered labourers. This amount would be given as one time settlement and the assistance would be given on the permanent disability percentage. For upto 50% handicapped percentage, the assistance amount is Rs. 1.5 lakh. For 51% to 75% disability percentage, assistance amount is Rs. 2 lakh and for 76% and above disability percentage, assistance amount is Rs. 3 lakh.
Haryana Labour Department Disability Assistance Scheme Form Online
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Disability Assistance Scheme online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete Handicapped Assistance Scheme details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Disability Assistance Scheme
Haryana Labour Welfare Board Disability Assistance Scheme Eligibility
Under the viklang assistance scheme of Haryana Labour Welfare fund, labour board provides Rs. 1.5 to 3 lakh on permanent disability of labourers at worksite. The eligibility criteria to avail Haryana Labour Disability Assistance Scheme are as follows:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
1


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
1


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
No


Labour Welfare Fund Haryana Disability Assistance Scheme 2019 is available for all registered workers of the Haryana state who suffers from permanent disability due to any accident at worksite.
Haryana Labour Department Disability Assistance Scheme Conditions
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Disabled Assistance Scheme in Haryana:-

All the labourers must be registered and have permanent membership / subscription.
In the identity certificate of the registered laborers, registration fees and updated subscription amount is to be mentioned.
Candidates must submit the permanent Disability Certificate from the Health department of Haryana govt.

All the disabled persons needs to apply online for Handicapped Assistance Scheme of Haryana Labour Department within 1 year of occurrence of disability. This assistance scheme for disabled persons has the main motto to create the best environment for the registered workers.

title: हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की चिकित्सा सहायता योजना 2019 ऑनलाइन पंजीकरण / आवेदन पत्र आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर उपलब्ध हैं, पंजीकृत कामगार की दुर्घटना होने या बीमारी से पीड़ित होने पर सरकारी हस्पताल एवं सरकार द्वारा अनुमोदित निजि हस्पताल में उपचार हेतु चार दिनों से 30 दिनों तक दाखिल रहने पर श्रमिक को राज्य में प्रचलित न्युनतम मजदूरी के हिसाब से मजदूरी क्षतिपूर्त/वित्तीय सहायता दी जाती है, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें
full_text:
हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की चिकित्सा सहायता योजना 2019 ऑनलाइन पंजीकरण / आवेदन पत्र आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर उपलब्ध हैं, पंजीकृत कामगार की दुर्घटना होने या बीमारी से पीड़ित होने पर सरकारी हस्पताल एवं सरकार द्वारा अनुमोदित निजि हस्पताल में उपचार हेतु चार दिनों से 30 दिनों तक दाखिल रहने पर श्रमिक को राज्य में प्रचलित न्युनतम मजदूरी के हिसाब से मजदूरी क्षतिपूर्त/वित्तीय सहायता दी जाती है, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें

Table of Contents

Haryana Labour Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana 2019Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme Form OnlineHaryana Labour Welfare Board Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme EligibilityHaryana Labour Department Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana Conditions
Labour department of Haryana invites Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme online application form at hrylabour.gov.in. Under this Haryana Labour Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana for labourers, labor dept. provides minimum wages (as fixed by Haryana govt.) in case of admitting of laborer in case of any accident or disease in any govt. / govt. aided hospital. People can now apply online, check conditions and eligibility criteria to avail Medical Aid Scheme for Labourers in Haryana (चिकित्सा सहायता योजना).
All the registered BOCW workers can avail this medical aid facility on being admitted to a hospital for 4 to 30 days. Haryana Labour Welfare Board Medical Treatment Assistance Scheme for labourers has the main objective to assist workers to lead a life of dignity and honour and not to worry about medical expenses.
The BOCW laborers can now apply online for Haryana Labour department Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana and fill online registration / application form.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Labour Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana 2019
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme 2019 aims to provide assistance to labourers in case they suffers from any accident or any other major ailment. This Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana by Haryana Labour Department will enable labourers to get their minimum wages in case they got admitted in the govt. / govt. aided hospitals.
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme Form Online
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme for labourers online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana.
Haryana Labour Welfare Board Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme Eligibility
Under the चिकित्सा सहायता योजना of Haryana Labour Welfare Board, labour dept. provide minimum wages to the laborers admitted in hospitals suffering from accident / major disease. These wages would be given when the laborer got admitted in govt. / govt. aided hospitals for 4 to 30 days duration. The rates of wages would be same as those fixed as minimum wages by the Haryana government under Haryana Labour Assistance for Medical Treatment Scheme. To avail the assistance, candidates must fulfill the eligibility criteria as shown below:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
1


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
1


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
No


Haryana Labour Department Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana Conditions
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Chikitsa Sahayata Yojana in Haryana:-

All the registered labourers must have minimum 1 years of membership / subscription.
In the identity certificate of the registered labourers, date of application and subscription amount needs to be mentioned.
All the laborers must be admitted for treatment in govt. / govt. aided hospitals for minimum 4 days to maximum 30 days. For this, they must produce a hospital certificate or proof.
This facility is not applicable for medical treatment of more than 1 month in a single year.

title: हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की अक्षम बच्चों को वित्तीय सहायता योजना 2019 ऑनलाइन पंजीकरण / आवेदन पत्र आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर उपलब्ध हैं, पंजीकृत कामगारों के ऐसे बच्चे जो मेडिकल आॅथोरिटी द्वारा 50 प्रतिशत या इस से अधिक शारीरिक अथवा मानसिक रूप से अक्षम/अपंग घोषित हो, को प्रतिमाह 2,000/- रूपये की सहायता राशि दी जाती है, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें
full_text:
हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की अक्षम बच्चों को वित्तीय सहायता योजना 2019 ऑनलाइन पंजीकरण / आवेदन पत्र आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर उपलब्ध हैं, पंजीकृत कामगारों के ऐसे बच्चे जो मेडिकल आॅथोरिटी द्वारा 50 प्रतिशत या इस से अधिक शारीरिक अथवा मानसिक रूप से अक्षम/अपंग घोषित हो, को प्रतिमाह 2,000/- रूपये की सहायता राशि दी जाती है, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें

Table of Contents

Haryana Labour Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers 2019Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers Form OnlineHaryana Labour Welfare Board Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers EligibilityHaryana Labour Department Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers Conditions
Labour department of Haryana invites Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers online application form at hrylabour.gov.in. Under this Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers, labor dept. provides Rs. 2,000 per month to child of registered laborers suffering from physical, mental disability. People can now apply online, check conditions and eligibility criteria to avail Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers in Haryana (अक्षम बच्चों को वित्तीय सहायता योजना).
All the disabled children of registered BOCW workers can avail this Rs. 2000 on being certified as 50% or more disabled by any medical authority. Haryana Labour Welfare Board Assisatance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers has the main objective to assist such children to lead a life of dignity and honour.
The children with disabilities of BOCW laborers can now apply online for Haryana Labour department Aksham Baccho Ko Vittiya Sahayata Yojana and fill online registration / application form.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Labour Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers 2019
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers 2019 aims to provide Rs. 2,000 p.m to disabled children of registered labourers. This Aksham Baccho Ko Vittiya Sahayata Yojana by Haryana Labour Department will enable labourers to get assistance in the proper nourishment and providing facilities to children suffering from disabilities.
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers Form Online
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete Aksham Baccho Ko Vittiya Sahayata Yojana details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers.
Haryana Labour Welfare Board Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers Eligibility
Under the अक्षम बच्चों को वित्तीय सहायता योजना of Haryana Labour Welfare Board, labour dept. provide Rs. 2,000 per month to disabled children of registered labourers who have 50% or more physical / mental disability. The eligibility criteria to avail assistance under Haryana Labour Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers are as follows:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
1


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
0


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
Yes


Haryana Labour Department Assistance Scheme for Disabled Children of Labourers Conditions
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Aksham Baccho Ko Vittiya Sahayata Yojana in Haryana:-

All the registered labourers must have minimum 1 years of membership / subscription.
In the identity certificate of the registered labourers, registration fees and subscription amount needs to be mentioned.
The children of registered labourers must be declared 50% or more physically / mentally disabled by any medical authority.

Along with the completed application form, Disability Certificate issued by medical authority must be attached.

title: Haryana Employment Department is inviting online applications at Job Fair Portal for Upcoming Rojgar Mela 2020. Now all the interested jobseekers can apply online by filling Haryana Job Fair Portal online registration form at hrex.gov.in. All the eligible candidates (as per job requirements) can apply for vacancies as shown on the portal on timely basis. The complete list of vacancies in various Mega job fairs in Haryana will remain available at official portal. Also check complete list of Rojgar Mela 2020 (Mega Job Fairs month wise) in state.
full_text:
Haryana Employment Department is inviting online applications at Job Fair Portal for Upcoming Rojgar Mela 2020. Now all the interested jobseekers can apply online by filling Haryana Job Fair Portal online registration form at hrex.gov.in. All the eligible candidates (as per job requirements) can apply for vacancies as shown on the portal on timely basis. The complete list of vacancies in various Mega job fairs in Haryana will remain available at official portal. Also check complete list of Rojgar Mela 2020 (Mega Job Fairs month wise) in state.
The major objective of making Haryana Job Fair Portal Registration is to provide employment to all unemployed educated youths in the state. All the applicants can check the upcoming Rojgar Mela or Mega Job Fair 2020 at official Haryana Employment Department Job Fair Portal. This portal will facilitate jobseekers to get better and suitable jobs as per their qualifications.
Various National and Multi-national companies (MNC’s) organize Mega job fairs in Haryana every year where lakhs of students gets placement. So, participate and be one of the selected candidates of next Rojgar Mela.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Job Fair Portal Online Registration Form 2020 for Jobseekers
Haryana Job Fair Portal is an initiative of Employment Department, Govt. of Haryana to provide employment opportunities to jobless youth in private sector. Here is the complete process to register yourself for upcoming mega job fair (Rojgar Mela 2020) in Haryana:-

Firstly visit the official job portal at hrex.gov.in
At the homepage, scroll over the “Accounts” section and click at the “Register” link.
Direct Link – https://hrex.gov.in/#/register
Here enter your mobile number and click at “Send OTP” button as shown below:-
Haryana Rojgar Mela Online Registration Form

Enter the OTP received on registered mobile number and click at the “Verify” button to validate OTP.
After successful verification, the Haryana Job Fair Portal Jobseekers Registration Form will appear as shown below:-
Haryana Job Fair Portal Jobseekers Registration Form

Here candidates needs to fill their basic details, mobile number, e-mail ID and click at ‘Sign Up’ button to complete the registration process. Verify the registration link sent at your e-mail ID.
Afterwards, the Haryana Job Fair Portal Apply Online Form will appear as follows:-
Haryana Job Fair Portal Apply Online Form

Here candidates can enter their personal details, communication, qualification, experience, physical attributes, preferences etc to complete the Job Fair Online Application process.

All the registered candidates can then appear for an interview / selection process in the upcoming job fairs in Delhi. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Upcoming Rojgar Mela List 2020 at Haryana Job Fair Portal
All the applicants can even check the complete list of vacancies or upcoming rojgar mela 2020 at Haryana Job Fair Portal. All the upcoming jobs organized by national or multi national companies will appear on this page along with date. So, applicants must regularly visit this page to secure a good job. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Table of Contents

Haryana Labour Free Travel Facility Scheme 2019Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Free Travel Facility Scheme Form OnlineHaryana Labour Welfare Board Free Travel Facility Scheme EligibilityHaryana Labour Department Free Travel Facility Scheme Conditions
Labour department of Haryana invites online application form for Free Travel Facility Scheme (मुफ्त भ्रमण सुविधा) at hrylabour.gov.in. Under this Haryana Labour Welfare Board Muft Bhraman Suvidha Yojana, labor dept. provides free travel to labourer and their 4 family members to religional / historical places. People can now apply online, check conditions and eligibility criteria to avail assistance under Free Travel Facility Scheme.
All the registered BOCW workers can avail this assistance for 1 time in 4 years duration. Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Free Travel Facility Scheme, laborers can get assistance to visit pilgrimage and historical places with their families.
All the BOCW laborers can now apply online for Haryana Labour Welfare Board Muft Bhraman Suvidha Scheme and fill online registration / application form.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Labour Free Travel Facility Scheme 2019
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Free Travel Facility Scheme 2019 aims to provide reimbursement of amount of visiting pilgrimage and historical places to registered labourers along with their 4 family members. This Muft Bhraman Suvidha Yojana by Haryana Labour Department will enable labourers to get assistance at rates of fares fixed by Indian Railways and Haryana Roadways.
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Free Travel Facility Scheme Form Online
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Free Travel Facility Scheme online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete Muft Bhraman Suvidha Yojana details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Free Travel Facility Scheme.
Haryana Labour Welfare Board Free Travel Facility Scheme Eligibility
Under the Free Travel Facility Scheme of Haryana Labour Welfare Board, labour dept. reimburses amount spent on visiting religional / historical places of registered labourers and 4 family members. The rates of reimbursement depends on the amount to visit such places as per the Indian Railways (Second Tier) and Haryana Roadways (General) rates. The eligibility criteria to avail assistance under Haryana Labour Free Travel Facility Scheme are as follows:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
2


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
1


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
No


Haryana Labour Department Free Travel Facility Scheme Conditions
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Muft Bhraman Suvidha Scheme in Haryana:-

All the registered labourers must have minimum 2 years of membership / subscription.
The actual fare ticket must be attached.
In the identity certificate of the registered labourer, registration fees and subscription amount is to be mentioned.

This facility will remain applicable for 1 time in 4 years duration. Free Travel Facility Scheme 2019 is available for all registered workers of the Haryana state. Moreover, the duration of visit to the religion (pilgrimage) and historical places must not exceed 10 days.

Under this Haryana Labour Welfare Board House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme, labor dept. provides interest free loans upto Rs. 2 lakh to labourers. People can now apply online, check conditions and eligibility criteria to avail assistance under this Housing Loan Scheme.
All the registered building and construction workers (BOCW) can avail this assistance for 1 time during their lifetime. Haryana Labour Welfare Fund House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme, laborers can avail assistance to purchase new homes or re-construct or renovate existing houses.

Haryana Labour House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme 2019
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Death Assistance Scheme 2019 aims to provide loans upto Rs. 2 lakh to BOCW laborers for purchase / construction of houses. This Interest Free Home Loan scheme by Haryana Labour Department will enable labourers to renovate / purchase their own houses.
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund House Construction / Purchase Loan Scheme Form Online
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete House Construction / Purchase Loan Scheme details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Home Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme.
Haryana Labour Welfare Board House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme Eligibility
Under the House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme of Haryana Labour Welfare Board, labour dept. provides interest free loans upto Rs. 2 lakh amount to registered labourers. The eligibility criteria to avail Haryana Labour House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme are as follows:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
5


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
1


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
No


Haryana Labour Department House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme Conditions
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme in Haryana:-

All the registered labourers must have minimum 5 years of membership / subscription.
The age of registered labourers must be at-least 8 years less than 60 years.
The maximum age of construction workers must be 52 years so that he / she can repay loan amount in the next 8 years.
This facility will remain applicable for 1 time in a lifetime.

Labour Welfare Fund House Purchase / Construction Loan Scheme 2019 is available for all registered workers of the Haryana state.

Haryana Labour Family Pension Scheme 2019Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Family Pension Scheme Form OnlineHaryana Labour Welfare Board Family Pension Scheme EligibilityHaryana Labour Department Family Pension Scheme Conditions
The labour department of Haryana has launched Family Pension Scheme for registered labourers. Under this Haryana Labour Welfare Board Family Pension Scheme, the dependent family members will get half of the pension amount of registered pensioner worker on his / her death. Laborers can now apply online and fill Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Family Pension Scheme form at hrylabour.gov.in
Haryana Labour Welfare Board Family Pension Scheme will provide assistance to family members BOCW laborers. Family Pension Scheme is applicable for all the registered labourers.
All the building and construction workers (BOCW) can now apply online for Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Family Pension Scheme and fill Haryana Labour Family Pension Scheme online registration / application form.

Haryana Labour Family Pension Scheme 2019
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Family Pension Scheme 2019 aims to provide financial assistance to the families of registered labourers. This family pension scheme for dependents of the labour pensioners has the main motto to create the best environment for the registered workers.
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Family Pension Scheme Form Online
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Family Pension Scheme online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete Family Pension Scheme details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Family Pension Scheme
Haryana Labour Welfare Board Family Pension Scheme Eligibility
Under the Family pension scheme of Haryana Labour Welfare Board, labour dept. provides half of the amount p.m to dependent member which was given to pensioner labour on his / her death. The terms and conditions to avail Haryana Labour Family Pension Scheme (Paarivarik Pension Yojana) are as follows:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
3


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
1


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
No


Labour Welfare Fund Haryana Family Pension Scheme 2019 is available for all registered workers of the Haryana state.
Haryana Labour Department Family Pension Scheme Conditions
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Family Pension Scheme in Haryana:-

At the time of death of labour pensioner, their dependent husband / wife will receive half of the pension amount per month as Family Pension Scheme of Haryana Labour department.
Candidates must submit the completed and verified identity certificate along with claim form. This ID certificate must contain the details of the submitted subscription amount and needs to be attached.

There is a provision that on the death of the pensioner worker, the pension which was being given to him would now be given to his dependent family member (half of amount) under Family Pension Scheme.

title: हरियाणा सरकार मुफ्त लैपटॉप योजना की शुरुवात करने जा रही है, इसके लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन फॉर्म आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर भरे जाएंगे, अपना नाम फ्री लैपटॉप स्कीम की लाभार्थी सूची में देखें, सरकारी स्कूल के छात्र जिनके दसवीं कक्षा में 90 प्रतिशत से ज्यादा अंक हैं वो इसके पात्र होंगे
full_text:
हरियाणा सरकार मुफ्त लैपटॉप योजना की शुरुवात करने जा रही है, इसके लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन फॉर्म आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर भरे जाएंगे, अपना नाम फ्री लैपटॉप स्कीम की लाभार्थी सूची में देखें, सरकारी स्कूल के छात्र जिनके दसवीं कक्षा में 90 प्रतिशत से ज्यादा अंक हैं वो इसके पात्र होंगे

Table of Contents

Haryana Free Laptop Scheme List of BeneficiariesHaryana Free Laptop Distribution Scheme Apply Online FormHaryana Muft Laptop Yojana Implementation
Haryana government is going to start Free Laptop Scheme 2019 for government school students. Under this free laptop distribution scheme, govt. will give muft laptops to those who have scored more than 90% marks in Class 10 state board examinations. All the beneficiaries whose name appears in the Haryana Free Laptop Yojana Beneficiary List will have to apply online to avail benefits.
All the government schools across the entire Haryana state have been asked to prepare list of beneficiaries for Free Laptop Scheme. The Muft Laptop Yojana beneficiary list will contain name of toppers who appeared for state board exams in March 2019. 
In this Haryana Muft Laptop Yojana, around 500 meritorious students will get free laptops.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Free Laptop Scheme List of Beneficiaries
Education Department of Haryana will divide students into five categories to prepare Free Laptop Scheme Beneficiary List:-

First 100 toppers (without caste, gender or income limit) of 10th state board examinations.
Top 100 girls in general category.
Top 100 boys from scheduled caste (SC) category.
Top 100 girls belonging to scheduled caste (SC) category.
Top 100 students from Below Poverty Line (BPL) category.

All the govt. schools have received a letter from Haryana govt. informing them about the Free Laptop Scheme. Those students who have passed their board exams this year would be awarded laptops which will help them to prepare themselves for higher education. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Free Laptop Distribution Scheme Apply Online Form
Just like laptop distribution schemes of other states like Karnataka, the state govt. of Haryana may invite online application forms for Muft Laptop Yojana. All the interested and eligible meritorious students will then have to apply online. For filling Free Laptop Distribution Scheme online application form, govt. may launch a new dedicated portal. The start and last dates for registration of Free Laptop Scheme in Haryana are still not finalized. As soon as the new guidelines are issued for application / registration, we will update it here.
Haryana Muft Laptop Yojana Implementation
Education Department of Haryana will also prepare list of BPL students. The state govt. will distribute free laptops to students – both boys and girls – of economically weaker sections of all communities whose annual family income falls below Rs. 2.5 lakh. The dept. will verify records of these students and will prepare list of beneficiaries after verifying their family income and other admission records by end of this month.
Haryana govt. has issued circular to all government schools about the Free Laptop Distribution Scheme. Previously in July, Haryana govt. has issued notification to all districts about a similar scheme. However, that Free Laptop Scheme was not implemented as list was not prepared by a few districts. This Muft Laptop Yojana will encourage students to secure good marks in the board examinations.

Labour Department of Haryana has launched Maternity Benefit Scheme 2019 for women workers. Now all the building and construction laborers particularly women will get assistance of Rs. 36,000 on the birth of children. All the registered labourers who are pregnant can now apply online and fill Haryana Maternity Benefit Scheme online registration form at hrylabour.gov.in.
In this Labour welfare fund scheme for pregnant women, Rs. 30,000 is given as Matritva labh and Rs. 6,000 for proper nutrition after birth of children. The major objective is to provide proper nutrition to the mother and children as both of them can shape the future of the country. Moreover, the living standards and health status of the workers will get improved.
This Matritva Labh Scheme is going to reduce the maternal mortality rate (MMR) and infant mortality rate (IMR). 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Maternity Benefit Scheme 2019 for Labourers
Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Maternity Benefit Scheme 2019 aims to provide financial assistance of Rs. 36,000 to the registered labourers on the birth of children.
1. Labour Welfare Fund Maternity Benefit Scheme Online Registration in Haryana
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Maternity Benefit Scheme online registration form.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

To read the complete scheme details, click at the link – Haryana Labour Welfare Fund Maternity Benefit Scheme 2019
2. Conditions to Avail Maternity Benefit Scheme Haryana Labor
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Maternity Benefit Scheme in Haryana:-

All the women labourers must be registered with at-least 1 year membership / subscription.
After the birth of the children, candidates must produce birth certificate (certified copy) must be attached.
Matritva Labh is given upto 2 children but in case the children are girls, then this maternity benefit can be availed for upto 3 daughters.
Completed application forms along with other documents must be submitted to the concerned authorities within 1 year of delivery.
All those registered women labourers whose husband is taking paternity benefits from any board / dept. / corporation are not eligible.

3. Eligibility Criteria for Haryana Labour Board Maternity Benefit Scheme
All the candidates must fulfill the eligibility criteria as mentioned in the table below to avail the Haryana Labour Board Maternity Benefit Scheme:-


Eligibility Criteria


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
at-least 1 year


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
upto 5


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
Female


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
No


The total assistance under maternity benefit scheme of Haryana labour is Rs. 36,000.

Labour department of Haryana has launched Marriage Assistance Scheme [बच्चों की शादी पर वित्तीय सहायता (सुपुत्री)] for girls of registered labourers. Haryana Labour Welfare Board will provide financial assistance of Rs. 50,000 to daughters of laborers before 3 days of marriage (शादी के तीन दिन पूर्व). People can now fill Haryana Labour Welfare Board Marriage Assistance Scheme Form at the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. 
This assistance under Baccho Ki Shadi Par Vittiya Sahayata Yojana would be provided in addition to the financial aid of Rs. 51,000 under Kanyadan Yojna in Haryana. The financial assistance under Haryana Labour Welfare Board Marriage Assistance Scheme is given to the laborers upto marriage of 3 daughters in a single family.
So, any registered unorganized sector workers (BOCW) can get total assistance of Rs. 1,01,000 on the marriage of their daughters.

2. Conditions to Avail Labour Welfare Board Marriage Assistance Scheme
People can follow the below mentioned conditions to avail financial aid under Labour Welfare Board Marriage Assistance Scheme in Haryana:-

All the labourers must be registered with at-least 1 year membership / subscription.
The complete details including application form number with identity certificate copy containing date of submission of application form must be produced.
Marriage registration certificate is an essential document.
All the candidates must also produce a self declaration certificate that he / she has will not get any assistance from any other govt. dept. / board / nigam.

Also Read – Haryana Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana

Eligibility Criteria

1 year

upto 3 daughters


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All

Haryana Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana 20191. Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana Online Registration in Haryana2. Conditions for Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana Haryana3. Haryana CM Women Labourers Welfare Scheme Eligibility
Labour Department of Haryana govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana 2019. Under this scheme, all the registered building and other construction workers particularly women will get financial assistance of Rs. 51,00. To avail this aid for purchase of useful items, fill Haryana Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana online registration form at hrylabour.gov.in
The main purpose of launching this women welfare scheme is to give workers better facilities to buy their needful things. All the women labourers will get this assistance every year at the time of renewal of their membership / subscription. Only the registered women laborers under the Labour dept. of Haryana can take the Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana scheme benefits.
The main objective of women labour welfare scheme is to provide financial assistance to the unorganized registered workers. Moreover, women workers will get better facilities in the state.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana 2019
Haryana Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana 2019 aims to provide financial assistance of Rs. 5100 to registered women labourers. At the time of renewal of their membership, this assistance would be given. Women laborers can purchase saree, suit, slippers, shoes, rubber mattresses, utensils for domestic use and even their sanitary napkins with this aid of Rs. 5,100. 
1. Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana Online Registration in Haryana
All the candidates can firstly visit the official website at hrylabour.gov.in. At the homepage, go to the “E-Services” section and make registration using Aadhaar card. Then make a login at the homepage of the official Labour dept. website and fill the Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana online registration form.

All the candidates can avail the assistance under Mukhyamantri Mahila Samman Yojana in Haryana in the following conditions:-

All the registered women labourers must be a member for at-least 1 year.
On the identity card of the registered laborers, the registration fees and contribution amount must be mentioned.
Registered women labour will get this assistance at the time of renewal of their membership / subscription.

हरियाणा श्रमिक विभाग की कन्यादान योजना 2019, पंजीकृत श्रमिकों की लड़कियों की शादी के लिए 51,000 रुपये का कन्या दान, जानिये पात्रता और आवेदन की शर्तें आधिकारिक वेबसाइट hrylabour.gov.in पर

Table of Contents

Haryana Labour Kanyadan Yojna 2019 for Daughter’s MarriageHow to Get Benefits of Kanyadaan Yojana in HaryanaHaryana Kanyadan Yojana Eligibility Criteria
Labour Department has launched Kanyadan Yojna (कन्यादान योजना) in Haryana to provide assistance to labourers on the occasion of their daughter’s marriage. Under Kanyadaan Scheme, all the registered laborers will get financial aid of Rs. 51,000 before 3 days of girl’s marriage. Check the eligibility criteria and procedure on how to apply online at the official website hrylabour.gov.in 
This amount is given by the labor department for the marriage of upto 3 daughters of a single family. The labourers can avail this aid as Kanyadaan before 3 days only for their daughter’s marriage not on their son’s marriage. This amount is in addition to the Rs. 50,000 assistance under Haryana Labour Welfare Board Marriage Assistance Scheme. 
Moreover, the marriage must be registered under the Marriage Registration Act. In addition to this, both the bride and bridegroom must also have attained the legal age of marriage. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Labour Kanyadan Yojna 2019 for Daughter’s Marriage
Kanyadaan Yojana in Haryana is being implemented by the Labour Department in which govt. provides assistance of Rs. 51,000 on marriage of daughter’s of labourers. The official website of Kanyadan Yojna in Haryana is hrylabour.gov.in from where people will get complete information. 
To know complete details, candidates can go to the “BOCW Welfare Schemes” section and then click at the “कन्यादान योजना (विवाह से तीन दिन पूर्व)(धारा 22(1)(h))” or directly click the link – Kanyadan Yojna in Haryana. Under this Kanyadaan Yojana, all the registered laborers will get this amount before 3 days of their girls marriage.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

How to Get Benefits of Kanyadaan Yojana in Haryana
All the candidates can avail benefits of Kanyadaan Yojana in Haryana by following the certain conditions:- 

Laborer must be registered and must have minimum one year of membership.
The marriage card and application form must be certified from any gazetted officer.
The age proof of bride and bridegroom (self attested copy) must be attached. For bride, the minimum age of marriage is 18 years while the minimum age of marriage of bridegroom is 21 years.
Moreover, the marriage registration certificate must be produced within 1 year of marriage.

Applicant must also make self declaration that people will not avail any further assistance from any other board/ dept./ corporation.
Also Read – Haryana Mukhyamantri Mahila Shramik Samman Yojana
Haryana Kanyadan Yojana Eligibility Criteria
The candidates must follow the given eligibility criteria to become eligible for Kanyadan Yojana in Haryana:-


Eligibility / पात्रता


Membership Years / सदस्यता वर्ष
1 years


Apply Frequency / आवेदन की सीमा
3 daughters


Scheme For / इस योजना के लिए
All


Continue After Death / मृत्यु के बाद जारी
Yes


People will get benefits of Rs. 51,000 before 3 days of their daughter’s marriage.

The form for new ration card application can be downloaded in PDF format from the official website of Haryana Food department at haryanafood.gov.in in both Hindi and English languages.
Ration Card in Haryana is a necessary document for the poor people to take benefits of most government schemes. Accordingly, people can purchase ration at subsidized rates from Ration Shops located nearby. Haryana Ration Card Apply Form PDF is now available for the general citizens of the state.
Haryana govt. has made this ration card new list public to make the process of finding name easier. Now candidates can search their name in the APL BPL List. For inclusion of their name in Ration card list (राशन कार्ड सूची), people can also download PDF of new ration card form in Hindi as given below.

In order to make fresh application for the Ration Card in Haryana, all the candidates can directly download the application form through the link given below:-

Download APL Ration Card Form PDF Haryana (in Hindi)

Requirements for New Ration Card (Offline Method)
There are following requirements for Ration Card in Haryana:-

All the candidates can also obtain the application form for a new Ration card from any circle office / S.D.O office.
People must posses passport sized photographs of the head of family attested by a gazetted officer / MLA / MP / Municipal Councillor. He / She must also have specified proof of residence and the surrender / deletion certificate of the previous Ration Card (if any).
In case the proof of residence is not available, then the circle FSO / S.I. / M.O. conducts spot inquiries and records the statements of 2 independent witnesses in neighbourhood.
The standard prescribed time schedule for the Ration Card preparation is generally 15 days. Although the procedure and time limit can vary from state to state.

The state govt. has also made a provision for making amendments to valid Ration Cards.

Haryana govt. will issue new ration cards for all the citizens whether BPL or APL candidates. It is necessary for getting ration through the distributors at various ration shops. Furthermore, all the citizens can check their name in the Haryana Ration Card New List 2018 at the official website of Food and Civil Supplies Dept. of Haryana.
Food and Civil Supplies Department of Haryana has released the Haryana Ration Card List (District Wise). All the citizens who have made fresh registration for the Ration Card can now check their name in the Eligible List of National Food Security Act (NFSA) / APL beneficiaries. Moreover, candidates whose name does not appears in the Ration Card New List 2019-2020 and wants to apply for name inclusion in new Ration card list can apply in the prescribed format.
Haryana Ration Card 2020
A Ration Card is an essential document issued by the state government for the purchase of essential commodities from fair price shops. There are different ration cards for Above Poverty Line (APL), Below Poverty Line (BPL) and Antyodaya families. It is a very useful document for Indian citizens as it saves money in procurement of essential commodities at a subsidized rate.
The ration card in Haryana could also be used as a proof of identification for other documents like Domicile Certificate, for inclusion of your name in the Electoral Rolls etc. In addition to the permanent ration cards, all the states can also issue temporary Ration cards which would remain valid for a specified number of months and are issued for relief purposes.

This app will enable any women or girl in distress to seek immediate help of the Police in case of any emergency. Now all women using smartphones can make Durga Shakti App Download through Google Play Store and access alert & other features of app.
full_text:
Haryana Police has launched a new mobile application namely Durga Shakti App for women. This app will enable any women or girl in distress to seek immediate help of the Police in case of any emergency. Now all women using smartphones can make Durga Shakti App Download through Google Play Store and access alert & other features of app. 
Any woman / girl can register herself after downloading the Durga Shakti App through Google Playstore on their mobile phones. Alert button feature is available which will enable the state police department to track the location of girl in case of emergency.
This app is very useful as we can’t help our family girl every time but now we can help our women, thanks to this Durga Shakti mobile app of Haryana police.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Haryana government has announced Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana for farmers and unorganized sector workers on 26 February 2019. Under this scheme, all the farmers of the state having cultivable land upto 5 acres of land and workers families having income less than Rs. 15,000 per month would be eligible. In Haryana Budget 2019-20, Finance Minister has announced to introduce a scheme to provide financial and social security cover to families of farmers and those of workers in the unorganised sector.
full_text:
Haryana government has announced Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana for farmers and unorganized sector workers on 26 February 2019. Under this scheme, all the farmers of the state having cultivable land upto 5 acres of land and workers families having income less than Rs. 15,000 per month would be eligible. In Haryana Budget 2019-20, Finance Minister has announced to introduce a scheme to provide financial and social security cover to families of farmers and those of workers in the unorganised sector.
Under the Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana in Haryana, each beneficiary family would be eligible to avail assistance of Rs. 6,000 per year. Moreover, each family will have to nominate a member to avail this benefit. This scheme will comprise of 2 categories where 1st category is of beneficiaries in the age group of 18 to 40 years and the 2nd category of beneficiary in the age group of 40 to 60 years.
In the 1st category, there would be 4 options to avail the financial assistance while in the 2nd category, there would be 2 options to avail assistance amount.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana 2019
The category wise details and assistance amount under Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana in Haryana has been described as follows:-

First Category – For beneficiaries in the age group of 18 to 40 years of age, there are 4 options as described below:-

In the 1st option, the families will get Rs. 6,000 per annum which is going to be deposited in 3 equal installments of Rs. 2,000 in the bank account of the head of the family.
In the 2nd option, each family will have to nominate a member to avail the scheme benefit. All the beneficiaries will get Rs. 36,000 after completion of 5 years.
Under the 3rd option, each nominated beneficiary will get pension of Rs. 3,000 to Rs. 15,000 per month on attaining the age of 60 years. This amount will depend on the age of beneficiaries at the start of the scheme.
Under the 4th option, each nominated beneficiary will get Rs. 15,000 to Rs. 30,000 after 5 years. This would depend on the option selected by the nominated beneficiary. The nominated beneficiaries can choose the option of insurance cover under the current Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana. The premium for this would be paid by the state government.


Second Category – For beneficiaries in the age group of 40 to 60 years, there would be 2 options:-

In the 1st option, beneficiaries can opt for Rs. 6,000 every year which is going to be deposited in 3 equal installments of Rs. 2,000 each. This amount would be transferred directly into the bank accounts of the head of the family.
In the 2nd option, the nominated beneficiary would get Rs 36,000 after every 5 year.



Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana in Haryana also includes an insurance of Rs. 2 lakh on natural death, insurance of Rs. 2 lakh for accidental death, insurance of Rs. 2 lakh for permanent disability and insurance of Rs. 1 lakh for partial disability.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

In addition to this, if the nominated beneficiary is also covered under PM Shram-Yogi Maandhan Yojana, then on attaining the age of 60 years, he / she will also get pension of Rs. 3,000 per month.

किसानों, कारीगरों और श्रमिकों को सालाना 6,000 रुपए देगी हरियाणा सरकार pic.twitter.com/xbp93373p9
— CMO Haryana (@cmohry) February 27, 2019

The state govt. of Haryana has already allocated Rs. 1500 crore for the successful implementation of the Mukhyamantri Parivar Samman Nidhi Yojana.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Haryana govt. is soon going to rollout Kisan Pension Scheme 2019 for farmers in the state. For this purpose, the state govt. has already constituted a committee to formulate the pension scheme for farmers. This committee will submit its report to the CM Manohar Lal Khattar. The committee members also hold discussions over the eligible age of farmers for the scheme.
full_text:
Haryana govt. is soon going to rollout Kisan Pension Scheme 2019 for farmers in the state. For this purpose, the state govt. has already constituted a committee to formulate the pension scheme for farmers. This committee will submit its report to the CM Manohar Lal Khattar. The committee members also hold discussions over the eligible age of farmers for the scheme. 
The retirement age for government sector employees is 58 years and so the govt. is considering to have a similar criteria of 58 years age limit or even lesser for Pension Scheme for Farmers in Haryana. 
Draft preparing committee for Kisan Pension Scheme is headed by Mr. Subhash Barala along with MLAs named Abhay Singh Yadav, Mahipal Dhanda, Ghanshyam Das Arora, Pawan Saini and Director of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare Department, Ajit Balaji Joshi.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Kisan Pension 2019 for Farmers
After the second meeting of the committee constituted by the Haryana govt. to formulate the pension scheme for farmers in Haryana, the state govt. has decided to rollout Kisan Pension Scheme 2019 for Farmers. The issues related to age limit, amount of pension, number of farmers to be covered under the Kisan Pension Yojana were discussed at the meeting. Earlier, the 1st meeting of the committee was held last month on 27 December 2018. 
In the 2nd meeting, it is decided that the committee is going to submit its report to the CM very shortly. It was informed that the deputy commissioners of all the districts have been directed to send the data of the farmers within 10 days. After report submission on Kisan Pension Scheme 2019, committee can take further action on the basis of collected data. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

This decision to implement pension scheme for farmers comes after the newly elected governments in Rajasthan, Chhattisgarh and Madhya Pradesh have announced Farm Loan Waiver Scheme. After such big step towards welfare of farmers, the state govt. is under big pressure to make big announcement for farmers of Haryana. 

आज चंडीगढ़ स्थित हरियाणा निवास में किसानों को पेंशन देने के मुद्दे पर हरियाणा सरकार द्वारा गठित कमेटी की बैठक की अध्यक्षता की। बैठक में विधायक श्री घमश्याम दास अरोड़ा, श्री अभय सिंह यादव, श्री पवन सैनी, श्री महिपाल ढांडा एवं कृषि विभाग के महानिदेशक श्री अजीत बालाजी जोशी शामिल रहे pic.twitter.com/cF8M8IC19i
— Subhash Barala (@subhashbrala) January 9, 2019

Moreover, the opposition parties like Congress and INLD have promised farm loan waiver scheme for farmers if they are voted to power in the assembly polls which are going to be held in October 2019.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Haryana govt. has decided to make the Parivar Pehchan Patra of each and every family in the state. This family identity certificate will ensure that all the beneficiaries would be able to avail the benefits of citizen centric services. Moreover, this family identity certification will curb corruption and will ensure that no eligible beneficiary is left out from taking benefits of the state government run welfare schemes.
full_text:
Haryana govt. has decided to make the Parivar Pehchan Patra of each and every family in the state. This family identity certificate will ensure that all the beneficiaries would be able to avail the benefits of citizen centric services. Moreover, this family identity certification will curb corruption and will ensure that no eligible beneficiary is left out from taking benefits of the state government run welfare schemes.
These Parivar Pehchan Patra will be prepared for single (nuclear) and joint (combined) families. CM has taken this decision in the meeting of the officials held on 1 January 2019. The state govt. has already prepared the database of more than 46 lakh (46,30,959) families on the basis of Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) Data 2011. 
This database is uploaded on the e-district portal of Haryana at https://edisha.gov.in/. For each family, there would be 14 digit identity ID number.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Parivar Pehchan Patra (Family Identity Certificate)
After the updation of data of family on the basis of residence, death and birth, the state government is consistently working to update data of families on the basis of SECC-2011 data. Till date, there are around 54 lakh families in the state which would get included in the updated database. To apply for Parivar Pehchan Patra in Haryana, all the people needs to fill the application form and submit it to the concerned authorities. 
CM has instructed all the officials to keep a performa of Family Identity Certificate in their offices. The application forms for Parivar Pehchan Patra will remain available at all the SDM offices, tehsil & block offices, schools, ration depot, gas agencies and other offices which deals with the general public. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

This availability of Haryana Parivar Pehchan Patra application forms at public dealing offices would ensure that people who comes to these offices to take benefits of government schemes can update their family details. Moreover, the state govt. is also working to simplify the process of making of birth certificate, death certificate and marriage registration certificate.

अब हर परिवार का होगा पहचान पत्र; भ्रष्टाचार पर लगेगा अंकुश। pic.twitter.com/AdmUeawY5W
— CMO Haryana (@cmohry) January 2, 2019

The data would be used by the departments to give benefit of various welfare services to its actual beneficiary. This family identity certificate would also remove duplication as Aadhaar number and phone number of the beneficiary would also be updated in the ‘Parivar Pehchan Patra’ performa.
The information regarding various govt. schemes must reach the people. For instance, if a person reaches the age of 60 years, then he / she must information that they now becomes eligible for Old Age Pension Scheme in Haryana. Similarly if any youth attains the age of 18 years, then he / she must get information about he / she is eligible for voting. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: हरियाणा मेरी फसल मेरा ब्यौरा पोर्टल
full_text:
हरियाणा मेरी फसल मेरा ब्यौरा पोर्टल

Table of Contents

Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Farmers Registration 2020Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Online Registration FormMarginal Farmers Registration of Crops (Only for Paddy)Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal 2020Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Registration BenefitsList of Documents for Meri Fasal Mera Byora RegistrationAn Overview of Meri Fasal Mera Byora Haryana 2020Meri Fasal Mera Byora Helpline
In Haryana, farmers can now make online registration of details of crops (e-kharid) through Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal at fasal.haryana.gov.in. Haryana crop details online registrations can be done by the village level entrepreneurs (VLEs) absolutely free at Atal Seva Kendra in villages or common service centres (CSCs). All the farmers can even make crop details online registration on their own at edisha.gov.in.
LATEST UPDATE: Registration at Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal fasal.haryana.gov.in has been started for paddy procurement for farmers outside the state.
If any farmer wants to sell their agricultural produce at MSP, then he must make online registration of crops at meri fasal mera byora portal. VLEs can carry out the work of making crop registrations online in Haryana. For this, each VLE will get Rs. 5 per khevat which would be provided directly into their bank accounts.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Farmers Registration 2020
From 5 October 2020 onward, Haryana govt. has started procuring paddy from farmers outside the state. This will help farmers of other states in selling their crops during the paddy procurement season which will discourage profiteering of traders. As per an official release, during procurement, the farmers should bring the certified copies of documents showing that they have sown paddy in their fields as owner or tenant. Farmers will get the benefit of many schemes of Haryana government directly by making registration at the official website.
Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Online Registration Form
Below is the complete procedure to make online registration of crop details (e-Kharid) of farmers:-


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Firstly visit the official website at fasal.haryana.gov.inAt the homepage, click at the “पंजीकरण (क्लिक करें)” link as shown in the figure:-
Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal Registration
Direct Link – https://fasal.haryana.gov.in/farmerreg
Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal Online Registration
Enter the mobile number (किसान(काश्तकार) पंजीकरण करने के लिये अपना मोबाइल नंबर सर्च बॉक्स मे भर कर खोजें). Afterwards, enter the OTP, enter crop sown details as shown here:-
Meri Fasal Mera Byora Crop Sown Details
Then applicants can click at “जारी रखें” button to open the farmers registration form as shown below:-
Meri Fasal Mera Byora Registration Form Farmer
Here farmers can make online registration for crops and submit crop details.
All these details for Online Registration of crops can either be filled by the VLEs or by farmers itself. Information received on this portal can be shared with farmers and Agriculture and Farmers Welfare department. All the information uploaded by the farmers cannot be used in any other legal claim. Patwaris would share data related to Jamabandhi. This process will ease down the crops procurement procedure.
Marginal Farmers Registration of Crops (Only for Paddy)
At the official website, farmers can click at the “सीमान्त किसान पंजीकरण (केवल धान के लिए)” link. Here is the direct link to make registration of paddy for marginal farmers – https://fasal.haryana.gov.in/nsreglogin. The marginal farmers registration form for paddy will appear as shown below:-
Meri Fasal Mera Byora Registration Marginal Farmers for Paddy 
Here farmers can enter the mobile number, captcha and click at “Proceed” button to start filling Meri Fasal Mera Byora Registration Form. 
Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal 2020
The state govt. of Haryana has started online registration of farmers at Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal from 5 October 2020. Farmers can apply online before last date for registration of crops at the official website. On October 5, a total of 8,34,721.26 quintal of paddy arrived in the Haryana mandi of which 43,794.44 quintals was purchased and 56,372.23 quintals of bajra arrived of which 4,309.2 quintals was purchased.
This portal has brought agriculture and farmers welfare departments on single platform. Along with this, department of Revenue, dept. of food, civil supplies and consumer affairs and dept. of science and technology have also been brought to this platform. This online portal will provide information related to sowing, harvesting season and market on real time basis to farmers. Through Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal 2020, farmers can make online registration by entering their crop details.
Haryana Meri Fasal Mera Byora Registration Benefits
Here the benefits of making registration at official portal by the farmers at fasal.haryana.gov.in:-
To ensure timely availability of subsidy on food, seeds, loans and agricultural equipment.To provide assistance to farmers in case of natural disaster or calamities. On making registration, farmers will get compensation for their crop loss.Providing benefits of government schemes, initiatives and grievance redressal of farmers on a single platform.Enabling farmers registration, crop registration and farm details at one place.To provide information regarding sowing, harvesting of crops and mandis to ensure proper selling of crops.
List of Documents for Meri Fasal Mera Byora Registration
Here is the complete list of documents to make registration at Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal:-1) Aadhaar Card of Applicants2) Residential Certificate3) Identity Certificate4) Mobile Number5) Land Documents of Farmers6) Recent Passport Size Photograph
An Overview of Meri Fasal Mera Byora Haryana 2020
Here is an overview of the Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal of Haryana at which farmers registration is necessary for crop procurement:-
Scheme NameMeri Fasal Mera ByoraState NameHaryanaPurposeFarmers Registration for Crops (e-Kharid), farm detailsBeneficiariesFarmersApplication ModeOnlineOfficial websitehttps://www.fasal.haryana.gov.in/
Meri Fasal Mera Byora Helpline
For any issue regarding the use and registration of crops on Meri Fasal Mera Byora Portal, farmers can reach at the following contact detailsTOLL FREE NUMBER: 1800-180-2117, 1800-180-2060 (9 am to 5 pm)EMAIL: mfmb-agri[at]hry[dot]gov[dot]in, hsamb[dot]helpdesk[at]gmail[dot]com





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Content Source / Reference Link: fasalhry.in

title: Haryana government has decided to provide 44,000 agriculture pump connections to farmers in the next 6 months. All the farmers whose tube well connections are pending since 1 January 2014 will be issued agricultural pump connections. The state govt. will issue demand notices for all the pending tube well connections by 31 March 2019.
full_text:
Haryana government has decided to provide 44,000 agriculture pump connections to farmers in the next 6 months. All the farmers whose tube well connections are pending since 1 January 2014 will be issued agricultural pump connections. The state govt. will issue demand notices for all the pending tube well connections by 31 March 2019.
The state govt. has set a target to issue 50,000 new solar energy connections in the state and out of this, tenders have been floated already for 15,000 connections. Usage of solar energy in tube wells reduces the entire power connection by about 30%. 
Around 468 agricultural tube wells under the Vayama Feeder of Karnal block and Saspur Feeder of Yamunanagar block would run on solar energy at an estimated cost of about Rs 25 crore.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Agricultural Pump (Tube Well) Connections for Farmers
A total number of 44,000 agricultural pumpsets connections would be issued to the farmers. Out of this, there are around 25,000 connections for small farmers and 15,000 solar pump connections. The state govt. is going to provide alternatives to the poor farmers to avail solar pump connections. As per the announcement for the CM Manohar Lal Khattar, the state govt. of Haryana will soon send demand notices to the applicants. 
All the applicant farmers needs to pay some fixed amount, after which the tube well connections would be issued to the farmers directly. Only those applicants, whose applications are pending since 1 January 2014 and 31 December 2018 will get these agriculture pump connections. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Govt. will also install around 10 lakh smart electricity meters by DISCOMS. In the 1st phase, smart meters would be installed in Karnal and Gurgaon districts and the work of installation of 10,000 such meters have already been started in Panipat. Govt. aims to provide electricity in each house under Ujala Yojana till 31 March 2019.

मनोहर सरकार की किसानों को सौगात "समृद्ध किसान-समृद्ध हरियाणा" @mlkhattar @subhashbrala @cmohry pic.twitter.com/7cY9folTn0
— Haryana BJP (@BJP4Haryana) December 27, 2018

CM said that under the ‘Mhara Gaon Jagmag Gaon’ scheme, around 610 feeders covering 2,870 villages are getting 24 hours power supply. Under Integrated Power Development Scheme (IPDS), govt. sanctions Rs. 390.59 crore to improve power system of 47 towns. Moreover, govt. will raise the capacity of new 33 KV sub-stations, 11 KV feeders, distribution transformers and existing transformers.

हरियाणा सरकार की किसान हितेषी योजनाएं "समृद्ध किसान-समृद्ध हरियाणा" @mlkhattar @subhashbrala @cmohry pic.twitter.com/lAV5S02K2Z
— Haryana BJP (@BJP4Haryana) December 27, 2018

For the first time in the state, all the 4 power companies have emerged from losses and have earned profit. In 2017-18, UHBVN earns a profit of Rs. 278 crore and DHBVN earns profit of Rs. 134 crore. Thus the total earned profits of these 2 companies is Rs. 412 crore. To ensure welfare of farmers, the power tariff has been reduced to almost half (50%). This reduction has considerably resulted in reducing the electricity bills of domestic consumers.
There were a total number of 54,08,722 electricity connections in Haryana in FY 2014. The state govt. has issued 10,87,835 new connections during the last 4 years. Out of these, around 4,48,588 connections were given to un-electrified households in the rural area.
As the Assembly elections (scheduled in Oct 2019) and Lok Sabha elections (scheduled in May 2019) dates are coming, so the state govt. wants to lure farmers. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Haryana govt. has allowed conversion of residential plots for commercial use keeping in view of the upcoming parliamentary and assembly elections. Along with this, govt. has also allowed regularization of existing illegal conversions from residential to commercial in urban areas across the state. People can now check rates, know the procedure on how to make conversion to convert their residential property to commercial use.
full_text:
Haryana govt. has allowed conversion of residential plots for commercial use keeping in view of the upcoming parliamentary and assembly elections. Along with this, govt. has also allowed regularization of existing illegal conversions from residential to commercial in urban areas across the state. People can now check rates, know the procedure on how to make conversion to convert their residential property to commercial use. 
This major decision is an after effect of the win of the current state government in 5 municipal corporations elections. Most of the property owners in the rehabilitation colonies, town planning and improvement trust schemes located within municipal limits in the state would be benefited.
This proposal was under consideration for some time, now CM Manohar Lal Khattar has approved this decision in the cabinet meeting held on 21 December 2018. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

How to Convert Residential Property to Commercial in Haryana – Check Rates
Cabinet committee has approved amendment in the policy parameters to convert residential plots for commercial use. Under the amendment, the state govt. has reduce the conversion charges or fees by almost half (to about 50%). The new fees / rate for conversion of residential plots for commercial use are as follows:- 

Municipal Corporations of Gurugram and Faridabad (Existing / Fresh) – For regularisation of existing buildings, conversion fees has been reduced from Rs. 15,325 / sq.m to Rs. 7,662 / sq.m. For fresh conversion, the conversion rates has been reduced from Rs. 14,000 / sq.m to Rs 7,000 / sq.m.
Other Municipal Corporations (Existing / Fresh) – The regularisation fee of existing buildings has been reduced from Rs. 12,180 / sq.m to Rs. 6,090 / sq.m and for fresh conversions, the rates has been reduced from Rs. 11,000 / sq.m to Rs. 5,500 / sq.m.
Municipal Council Areas (Existing / Fresh) – In existing municipal council areas, the charges for regularisation of existing buildings have been reduced from Rs. 10,608 / sq.m to Rs. 5,304 / sq.m. For fresh conversions, the rates have been reduced from Rs. 9,000 / sq.m to Rs 4,500 / sq.m.
Municipal Committee Areas (Existing / Fresh) – The charges for regularisation of existing buildings would be reduced from Rs. 9,316 / sq.m to Rs 4,658 / sq.m. For fresh conversion, the rates have been reduced from Rs. 8,000 / sq.m to Rs. 4,000 / sq.m.
Haryana Conversion Charges Residential Property Commercial

The state govt. will provide an extension of 3 months from date of issuance of order time limit. This will assist people to apply for conversion / regularization under the policy.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Information Source: https://prharyana.gov.in/en/haryana-cabinet-which-met-under-the-chairmanship-of-chief-minister-mr-manohar-lal-here-today-73





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});
