title: Haryana Government is going to provide bank loans to the Cobblers to set up their kiosks (small counters). Subsequently, govt. will provide loan amount of up to Rs. 15,000 under Differential Rate of Interest (DRI) Scheme. Accordingly, this scheme will provide easy & hassle free loans. This scheme is launched for their financial inclusion in the mainstream.
full_text:
Haryana Government is going to provide bank loans to the Cobblers to set up their kiosks (small counters). Subsequently, govt. will provide loan amount of up to Rs. 15,000 under Differential Rate of Interest (DRI) Scheme. Accordingly, this scheme will provide easy & hassle free loans. This scheme is launched for their financial inclusion in the mainstream. 
Accordingly under DRI Scheme, several public and private sector banks provides loans at 4% interest rates. Moreover, these loans are given to the people of various selected low-income groups to boost their new / existing businesses.
The state govt. should also make arrangements for loan recovery and also provide loan repayment from CM Relief Fund in case on non-payment of the loan amount by the beneficiary.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Cobblers Bank loans – DRI Scheme
The important features and highlights of this loan scheme are as follows:-

Cobblers in Haryana can get loan amount of Rs. 15,000 from banks to start their own business.
Subsequently in response to this scheme, various banks are willing to provide loans to the cobblers.
Under DRI Scheme, cobblers will now get loans at 4% to boost their productive work.
Several Banks will provide maximum support to the economically weaker cobblers under DRI Scheme to bring them in the mainstream.
For this reason, state govt. will have to ensure the back-up arrangement for the banks. If any person does not repay his / her loan on time, then state govt. should make repayment of the loan amount through the Chief Ministers Relief Fund.
Furthermore, state govt. has also urged the bankers to contribute some part of the profits earned in social works under Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) scheme.

CM Khattar on his way to the Chandigarh met a cobbler working in Shahabad working in miserable situation. Subsequently, he announces financial assistance from CM Fund and give further directions to the concerned authorities to set up a working stall (kiosk) for him.

title: The state government of Haryana has introduced 100 Dial Scheme to reduce criminal cases and to provide fair justice to victims in the state. The state government has decided to provide 600 vehicles to the police department that means each police department in all the district will get 30 to 35 vehicles.
full_text:
The state government of Haryana has introduced 100 Dial Scheme to reduce criminal cases and to provide fair justice to victims in the state. The state government has decided to provide 600 vehicles to the police department that means each police department in all the district will get 30 to 35 vehicles.
The 100 Dial scheme is going to be likely implemented from November 1, 2018, across the state. The state government will spend Rs. 153 crore for this scheme. Under the scheme, if any person will contact control room for the help, would get police assistance within 15 minutes that victim in any corner of the state. The objective of this scheme is to provide a safe and crime-free environment to all the citizens in the state. 
100 Dial Scheme
This scheme was launched by the CM of Haryana at Panchkula. He also inaugurated eight Mitra Kaksh in Civil Lines Police. On the occasion, he said their government is providing a fearless environment to the people of the state. He also said that these eight Mitra Kaksh have been established at the cost of Rs. 2 crores to develop coordination among police and people. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

In all the eight Mitra Kaksh, the officer of police and the members of Community Liaison Group will sit in these Mitra Kaksh without uniform. These officers will listen to the grievances of people and try to solve the grievance through mediation. If a grievance could not be solved through mediation then FIR will be registered against the person. 
The state government has informed that the first phase of eight Mitra Kaksh is being established in Karnal and Rohtak districts. However, More Mitra Kaksh will establish throughout the state but after the success of the first phase. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Moreover, the state government will provide a safe environment in these Mitra Kaksh where the victims will present their views and share their problems without any hesitation.

title: The state government of Haryana is going to launch Cashless Treatment Scheme for the state government employees and pensioners. Under the scheme, the beneficiary will get cashless medical services up to Rs. 5 lakh. This scheme will start from 30 November 2017 in the state.
full_text:
The state government of Haryana is going to launch Cashless Treatment Scheme for the state government employees and pensioners. Under the scheme, the beneficiary will get cashless medical services up to Rs. 5 lakh. This scheme will start from 30 November 2017 in the state. 
The cashless treatment will function under the direction of Haryana Health Department. The benefit of the scheme is only for regular state government employees and pensioners. The pensioners will be identified on the basis of the report from Finance Department & NIC while the employees will select on the basis of HRMS Data.
However, the Health Department will also upload this date on the official website. The hospital can check the details of beneficiaries by going to the official website of Health Department.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Highlights Cashless Treatment Scheme

The benefit of the scheme is only for regular employees of State government and pensioners.
The spouse and dependent on state govt. employees and pensioners will not be able to get the benefits of this scheme.
However, the spouse and dependent on state govt. employees and pensioners will get the medical service as per the existing policy of reimbursement issued dated May 6, 2005.
The beneficiary will be able to get medical services up to a maximum limit of Rs. 5 lakh. In case the cost of treatment is exceeded, then the employee or pensioner will have to pay the remaining amount.
The exceeded amount will be paid by the employee or pensioner. Their relative department will later reimburse this excess amount as per the entitlement and existing reimbursement policy.
Haryana Govt. will issue Identity Cards which would be linked with Aadhar to the regular employees and pensioners while the pensioners will have to carry Pension Payment Order (PPO) as Identity Proof to avail the benefits of the scheme.

List of Six Diseases
The cashless treatment scheme would be applicable only for six life-threatening conditions as given below:-


brain haemorrhage
cardiac emergency


coma
accident


third and fourth stage of cancer
electrocution


Under the scheme, the beneficiary will be able to get treatment at all government medical colleges and government aided Medical Colleges all over the state, all district hospitals, other health institutions of the state government and all private hospitals empanelled under the Haryana government.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

The interested candidate can download the list of all the empanelled hospitals under the Haryana government. Below given the link to download the PDF.
Haryana Empanelled Hospitals

title: The state government of Haryana has announced Domestic electricity connection for the rural people. Under the scheme, the poor people will get the power connection on EMI. Accordingly, the rural people merely have to pay Rs. 200 in the beginning and can get a domestic power connection in any specified area of the state. The remaining amount can be paid in the easy instalments of Rs. 100 to Rs. 200.
full_text:
The state government of Haryana has announced Domestic electricity connection for the rural people. Under the scheme, the poor people will get the power connection on EMI. Accordingly, the rural people merely have to pay Rs. 200 in the beginning and can get a domestic power connection in any specified area of the state. The remaining amount can be paid in the easy instalments of Rs. 100 to Rs. 200.
Under the Domestic electricity connection scheme, economically weaker sections (EWS) in the society will not need to pay the entire amount at one time getting the power connection. The government has informed that presently citizens are spending Rs. 3,000 to Rs. 4000 to get a power connection. 
The objective of the scheme is to provide power connection to each section of the society especially economically backward class. Therefore, now rural people across the state will get Power connections on EMI (Installments).



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Domestic Electricity Connection
According to the release notification, the state government has already launched various schemes in the state. These schemes have helped in reducing the losses of the Power Department by 7 percent. Moreover, various villages in the state are getting the 24*7 power supply.
The power department is supplying power 24 * 7 in many Villages where line losses have been reduced by 20 percent. The government has identified four districts in the state including Panchkula, Ambala, Gurugram and Faridabad where are getting the 24*7 power supply.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Haryana Domestic Power Connection Scheme
The state government has informed that they will provide 24-hour power supply all over the state within their office duration. The state government will also change the perspective of those people who are not paying their power bill deliberately.

title: The state government of Haryana has launched a scheme named as “Uchch Shiksha Loan Yojana” or the Higher Education Loan Scheme for poor girl students across the state. The main objective of this scheme is to provide loan facility to those girls who have left their studies incomplete for not being able to pay the fee amount of higher studies.
full_text:
The state government of Haryana has launched a scheme named as “Uchch Shiksha Loan Yojana” or the Higher Education Loan Scheme for poor girl students across the state. The main objective of this scheme is to provide loan facility to those girls who have left their studies incomplete for not being able to pay the fee amount of higher studies. 
Under Uchch Shiksha Loan Yojana, the state government will provide financial assistance to needy girl students to complete their higher studies. The scheme will be operated by the authority of Women Development Corporation, Haryana.
The scheme will help encourage the girl students especially from the backward classes and economically weaker section to pursue higher studies, achieve their career goals and be independent. The education loan for higher studies under the scheme will be provided at a subsidized interest rate of only 5% per annum.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Eligibility for Uchch Shiksha Loan Yojana
Below is the eligibility criteria for Haryana Higher Education Loan Scheme or Uchch Shiksha Loan Yojana

The applicant should be the permanent residence of Haryana.
The applicant should be at least 12th passed.
The benefit of the scheme will be provided only to the girl students in the state.
The age of girl should be 18 years or above.
The financial assistance would be provided only for higher studies.

According to the official data, the literacy rate in Haryana is 67.91 percent, which is higher than the National average of 64.80 percent. The literacy rate for males is 78.49 percent and females is 55.73 percent which is also higher than the national average.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

The literacy rate among SC / ST is 55.45 percent which is lower than the national average. Literacy rate among SC / ST female is only 42.26 percent. However, male literacy (66.93 percent) is much higher than the female literacy among SC / ST.
Feature of Uchch Shiksha Loan Yojana

Girl students will get loan only at 5% interest rate.
This scheme will motivate the girls for higher studies.
The women employees of Haryana government will also be eligible for this scheme if the want to pursue higher studies.
The beneficiaries of this loan scheme also will be eligible for higher education in abroad.

Unfortunately, the women are facing many problems including rape, discrimination, inequality etc. throughout the country. To overcome these issues, government should formulate a policy which provide equal opportunity for the girls. 
This scheme will surely improve the condition and encourage the more women / girls to become educated.

full_text:

The surgical facility is very costly for common man and mostly the operations are conducted by private hospitals. To bring down the cost of surgery operation, Haryana govt. has announced the medical insurance scheme.

Objective of Medical Insurance Scheme
The main purpose of the scheme is to provide affordable operation of surgeries and bring down the burden on the head of the poor people. Under this scheme, a nominal premium will have to be paid by the patient’s family and the remaining payment would be collected from the insurance company.
Last year in the state budget, Haryana government had increased the finance to the medical education and health services expenditure by more than 15 percent. The govt. has also made a provision of Rs 3,839 crore in the budget.

The following applicants would be eligible to participate for the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana demand survey

People living in urban areas and were residents of the state as on 17 June 2015.

The applicants should have Aadhar Card and a bank account.
The applicant or his/her family should not own a pucca house in any other locality.
The applicant should not have already benefited under any state or central housing scheme.

title: हिमाचल प्रदेश वोटर लिस्ट 2020 (PDF) अब सीईओ की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर उपलब्ध है, नयी हिमाचल प्रदेश मतदाता सूची में अपना नाम अपनी जानकारी या EPIC नंबर के आधार पर खोजें और वोटर ID कार्ड डाउनलोड करें
full_text:
हिमाचल प्रदेश वोटर लिस्ट 2020 (PDF) अब सीईओ की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट पर उपलब्ध है, नयी हिमाचल प्रदेश मतदाता सूची में अपना नाम अपनी जानकारी या EPIC नंबर के आधार पर खोजें और वोटर ID कार्ड डाउनलोड करें

Table of Contents

CEO Voter List 2020 Himachal Pradesh (PDF Electoral Rolls) DownloadHP Voter ID Card Download – Find Name Online in HP Elector Voter List 2020Find Name in Voter List Himachal Pradesh by Name & Voter ID Card No.HP Election Voter List Name Search Online
CEO Himachal Voter List | Electoral Voter List | Voter List 2020 HP | Voter ID Search by Village | Polling Booth List in Himachal Pradesh | HP Election Voter List 2020 | Voter List 2020 Himachal Pradesh | Himachal Pradesh Voter ID Card List | HP Voter ID Card Download
Election Commission of India (ECI) had announced Lok Sabha (general) election dates in the country. In the Himachal Pradesh state, voting for 4 Lok Sabha seats was held on 19th May 2019 (7th Phase). Chief Electoral Officer has published Final Himachal Pradesh CEO Voter List 2020. Here people can perform name search in the New HP PDF Electoral Rolls and download Voter ID Card at https://himachal.nic.in/index.php?lang=1&dpt_id=6
All the citizens can check their name in the district wise CEO Himachal Pradesh Voter List 2020 with Photo and download HP Voter ID Card. The updated HP Electoral Voter List with Photo are available in the PDF format where people can find their name in the CEO HP Voters List 2020 Village wise and can Download HP Voter ID Card before casting their vote.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

The entire PDF file of the HP Electoral Roll (Voter List) 2020 is now available. Here citizens can perform manual searching in the HP Election Voter List 2020. Moreover, people can adopt a hassle free process and check their names online in the Voter List 2020 Himachal Pradesh. 
CEO Voter List 2020 Himachal Pradesh (PDF Electoral Rolls) Download
Below is the complete procedure to download HP CEO Voter List 2020 PDF Electoral Rolls:-


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});


Visit the official website at of CEO Himachal Pradesh at https://himachal.nic.in/index.php?lang=1&dpt_id=6
At the homepage, click at the “Electoral Rolls [PDF Files]” link to download PDF Files of Voters List in Himachal Pradesh:-
Electoral Voter List Himachal Pradesh
Direct Link – HP CEO Electoral Rolls PDF Download
The Himachal Pradesh Voter List 2020 PDF files download page will appear as follows:-
CEO Himachal Voter List PDF Download
Here candidates can enter the district name, assembly segment, polling stations and click at the “Show PDF” option to open the final CEO Voter List 2019-2020 Himachal Pradesh

Finally, candidates can find their name manually in the HP CEO Voters List 2020.
HP Voter ID Card Download – Find Name Online in HP Elector Voter List 2020
All the citizens can now search elector / electoral roll online to find name in the HP Elections Voter List through the link below:-

http://admis.hp.nic.in/erms/ErollSearch.aspx
The ERoll Search page for electors will appear as shown below:-
Himachal Pradesh Voter ID Card List

Here candidates can search their name in the HP Election Voter List and can also print village / panchayat / ward wise Himachal Pradesh Voter ID Card list.
Find Name in Voter List Himachal Pradesh by Name & Voter ID Card No.
To find name in Voter List Himachal Pradesh by Name and Voter ID Card number, click the link given below:-
http://hp.gov.in/electionsearch/
HP Voter List 2020 Search by Name
All the candidates can even search their details through name and voter ID card number.
HP Election Voter List Name Search Online
All the candidates can even search their name in the HP Election Voter List online through the link given below:-
electoralsearch.in
Here candidates can enter their name, father / husband name, date of birth, gender, state, district, assembly constituency and click at “Search” button to find name online in the HP CEO Election Voters List. 
— Also Search Your Name in HP Electoral Rolls by SMS

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has decided to implement HP Ujjwala Grahini Suvidha Yojana (GSY) in the cabinet meeting held on 8 January 2019. Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana application form is available in PDF format at the official website. People can download E-KYC form and application form pdf of Grahani Suvidha Yojna to avail domestic LPG gas connections.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has decided to implement HP Ujjwala Grahini Suvidha Yojana (GSY) in the cabinet meeting held on 8 January 2019. Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana application form is available in PDF format at the official website. People can download E-KYC form and application form pdf of Grahani Suvidha Yojna to avail domestic LPG gas connections.
Grihini Suvidha Yojana in Himachal Pradesh is going to result in women empowerment and will also help in creating a pollution free environment in the state. HP govt. will implement this Grahini Suvidha Yojana (HGSY) with an outlay of Rs. 12 crore.
Previously, the state govt. has announced this Grihini Sividha Yojna in the annual Himachal Pradesh Budget 2018-19.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana Application Form Download
Below is the complete procedure to download the Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana Form PDF:-

Firstly visit the website http://admis.hp.nic.in/ehimapurti/downloads.htm
At the homepage, click at the “Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana Form” link.
Direct Link – Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana Form PDF
Afterwards, the E-KYC form and application form for HP Grahani Suvidha Yojana will appear on the 1st & 2nd page in the pdf file. E-KYC form will appear as shown below:-
Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana E-KYC Form Download
Moreover, Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana Application Form will appear as shown below:-
Himachal Grihini Suvidha Yojana Application Form
Download the PDF file, fill both the E-KYC & application forms for Grahini Suvidha Yojana and submit it too the concerned authorities to avail domestic LPG gas connections.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Grahini Suvidha Yojana Details
The highlights of Himachal Pradesh Grahani Suvidha Yojna are as follows:-

HP govt. will provide security amount for domestic Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) connection and a gas stove to the poor families.
All families in the state who does not possess the LPG Gas Connections and are not covered under Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY) will get covered under HP Grahani Suvidha Scheme 2019.
This scheme aims to provide LPG Gas connection facility to all the poor families for at-least 2 years.

Also Read – Himachal Grahini Suvidha Yojana Scheme
To successfully implement the HP Grahini Suvidha Yojna, the state govt. has made a budgetary provision of Rs. 12 crore.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Aashirwad Yojana to provide free baby kits to all new born babies. All the infants who takes birth in government hospitals will get these free kits for babies. The state govt. will start distributing these kits worth Rs. 1500 from December 2018.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Aashirwad Yojana to provide free baby kits to all new born babies. All the infants who takes birth in government hospitals will get these free kits for babies. The state govt. will start distributing these kits worth Rs. 1500 from December 2018.
The tender process for HP Mukhyamantri Aashirwad Yojana has been finalized and the supply order has been generated by the state government. Moreover, the state govt. is already providing Rs. 700 to the mothers during their pregnancy. This scheme is going to benefit more than 1 lakh infants every year.
This scheme would encourage women to give birth to their child in the hospitals so that the child gets mother’s milk and gets proper nourishment. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Pradesh Mukhyamantri Aashirwad Yojana
The important features and highlights of this scheme are as follows:-

All the baby kits distributed under Mukhyamantri Aashirwad Yojana will consists of 15 things necessary for newly born babies.
These 15 things includes suit, pair of vests (baniyan), velvet cloth, pair of gloves (dastane), pair of socks, massage oil, towel, 6 nappies, mosquito curtain (machardani), blanket, 1 toy. For mothers, there is toothpaste & tooth brush, bathing soap, vaseline and sanitizer.
The items in the distributed baby kits (baby care kits) will have a total cost of around Rs. 1500.
In the FY 2018-19, the state govt. has made a budgetary provision of Rs. 15 crore for this CM Ashirwad scheme. 
Around 1 lakh infants would get these baby kits every year.
Only those mothers who give birth to the children in hospitals would be eligible for this scheme. Even such mothers would also get financial assistance of Rs. 700 on the birth of new baby.

Mukhyamantri Ashirwaad scheme has been announced in the HP Budget 2018-19 and is approved by the cabinet committee last month. As per the reports from the official sources, all the technicalities have been completed to start the scheme. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Of all the schemes of Health department announced by CM in the Budget, work on around 90% of the schemes have been completed. All the new born babies who are born in the hospitals will get these kits worth Rs. 1500. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh government has approved to implement Sashakt Mahila Yojana in the cabinet meeting held on 20 November 2018 which was presided over by the CM Jai Ram Thakur. This scheme has been launched to empower rural women and to provide them an interface for organisation and socio-economic development. The cabinet committee has taken various other social welfare measures to benefit every section of the society.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh government has approved to implement Sashakt Mahila Yojana in the cabinet meeting held on 20 November 2018 which was presided over by the CM Jai Ram Thakur. This scheme has been launched to empower rural women and to provide them an interface for organisation and socio-economic development. The cabinet committee has taken various other social welfare measures to benefit every section of the society.
Under Sashakt Mahila Yojana, the state govt. will appoint 1 women development officer and fill 2 posts of district coordinator. HP state cabinet has also approved the opening of a government pharmacy college in Seraj area of Mandi district.
In addition to this, the state govt. gave its permission to create Sub Tehsil at Mandap in Mandi district. This would have total 9 patwar circles for the population of 12440.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Sashakt Mahila Yojana for Rural Women
Sashakt Mahila scheme not only ensure to link rural women with sustainable livelihood opportunities but also to improve their skills by imparting suitable training. Cabinet committee has also decided to open a police post at Yashwant Nagar under Police Station Rajgarh in Sirmaur district. The state govt. will also create 7 posts of various categories to benefit 48 villages of the area. HP govt. will open police post at Shoghi under Boileauganj Police Station in Shimla district. 
The state govt. has approved to fill up 54 posts of Junior Office Assistant (IT) on contract basis in Women and Child Development Directorate, Himachal Pradesh. HP govt. has approved filling up of 3 creche workers and 15 posts of creche helpers by HP state council for child welfare under National Creche Scheme in different districts.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP cabinet also approved creation and filling up ten posts of Junior Office Assistant (IT) on contract basis in Industries Department. 

मंत्रिमंडल की बैठक में जनता की मांगों के मद्देनजर महत्वपूर्ण निर्णय लिए। इसके तहत विभिन्न योजनाओं को शुरू किया जाएगा, विभिन्न संस्थान स्थापित किए जाएंगे ।#कैबिनेटबैठक#शिखरकीओरहिमाचल pic.twitter.com/IXvSoPUeAm
— CMO HIMACHAL (@CMOFFICEHP) November 20, 2018

Cabinet committee has agreed to open Ayurvedic health centre at village Sain in Bharata Gram Panchayat of Thural tehsil in Kangra district. In addition, the govt. will create requisite posts to run this centre. Around 84 posts of warden in H.P prisons and correctional services deparment will be filled on contract basis. The state govt. has approved to fill up 10 posts of class III and class IV of different categories in HP Technical University, Hamirpur. HP cabinet committee has also approved the amendment to Section 35 of the HP Town and Country Planning Rules, 2014. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh cabinet committee has taken a number of decisions on 5 November 2018 for the welfare of common people. To ensure the objective of “Healthy Himachal”, the state govt. has decided to start HP Mukhyamantri Nirog Yojana. There is no age limit and the scheme will be applicable to all the permanent citizens of the state.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh cabinet committee has taken a number of decisions on 5 November 2018 for the welfare of common people. To ensure the objective of “Healthy Himachal”, the state govt. has decided to start HP Mukhyamantri Nirog Yojana. There is no age limit and the scheme will be applicable to all the permanent citizens of the state. 
The primary objective of Mukhyamantri Nirog Yojana is to identify long term problems through check-ups and to ensure proper cure to people. Under this scheme, the state govt. will provide free medicines for proper cure of the health problems.
The announcement of this health scheme was made in the Himachal Pradesh budget 2018-19.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Mukhyamantri Nirog Yojana for All Citizens
The important features and highlights of CM Nirog Yojana are as follows:-

All the citizens of the state belonging to any age group can avail the scheme benefits.
The state govt. will provide free medicines to the citizens for all types of diseases.
Mukhyamantri Nirog Yojana will primarily benefit the poor people so that they can get proper treatment on time. Health problems can be identified at the initial stage to provide proper treatment to the people.
Under this scheme, random blood tests, eye check-up, blood pressure test and other tests would be performed absolutely free of cost.
In the initial phase, the state govt. will provide 330 free medicines while 66 medicines are already available.
All the children below 8 years of age will get free injections for insulin and haemophilia.
This scheme will reduce the risk of Measles and Rubella.

The state govt. of Himachal Pradesh has launched Mukhyamantri Nirog Yojana in order to perform general health check up of the people. This scheme is to be implemented by the health department of the state.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Random tests for blood sugar, blood pressure, eye check-up and other lab check-ups will be performed. These tests will help in the identification of long term problems of the citizens. 

मंत्रिमंडल की बैठक में अहम विषयों पर चर्चा करने के साथ महत्वपूर्ण निर्णय लिए। स्वास्थ्य के क्षेत्र में बड़ी योजना को शुरू करने की मंजूरी दी, इससे सभी वर्गों को लाभ मिलेगा।#शिखरकीओरहिमाचल#मंत्रिमंडलकीबैठक pic.twitter.com/fNWPVnzIlO
— CMO HIMACHAL (@CMOFFICEHP) November 5, 2018

The state govt. has also made other announcements in the cabinet meeting held on 5 November 2018. For complete details of the decisions taken, visit the official website www.cmohimachal.com





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Him Pragati portal developed by MeitY to facilitate private investors establishing projects in state in Power, Tourism and Industrial sectors. This is the official web portal of the Chief Minister’s office, Himachal pradesh. Interested investors can make private user project registration at the official Him Pragati Portal at himpragati.nic.in
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Him Pragati portal developed by MeitY to facilitate private investors establishing projects in state in Power, Tourism and Industrial sectors. This is the official web portal of the Chief Minister’s office, Himachal pradesh. Interested investors can make private user project registration at the official Him Pragati Portal at himpragati.nic.in 
Private investors can raise their concerns regarding projects to speed up the entire execution process. This site is informative as it contains the list of HP govt. schemes, employment generation activities, jan manch section and provides links to other govt. department / officials also.
The content at this Him Pragati portal is owned by respective organizations which may be contacted for further information or suggestion. Neither NIC nor Chief Minister’s Office (CMO) is liable for any inadvertent or typing errors.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Him Pragati Portal Private User Registration
Below is the complete procedure to make private user registration at the Him Pragati Portal:-

Visit the official website himpragati.nic.in
At the homepage, click at the “Private User Registration” tab present in the header or directly click this link
Here candidates can read Instructions and enter the “mobile number” to generate OTP as shown in the figure below:-
Him Pragati Portal Investor Registration
After verification of OTP, the private user project registration form will appear as follows:-
Private User Project Registration Him Pragati Portal
Here candidates needs to select the project sector, execution mode, description, location, status and complete project related details and upload the necessary documents.
Finally, click at the “Save” button to submit your project application and for faster execution.

Hon'ble Chief Minister of HP launched 'Him Pragati' portal (https://t.co/x8joDaFjFO), developed by #NICMeitY, to facilitate private investors establishing Projects in State in Power, Tourism &Industrial sectors. They can raise concerns in projects to speed up execution pic.twitter.com/evpnFh8xRx


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

— NIC (@NICMeity) October 18, 2018


Furthermore, candidates can make Login to complete the application process. Investors can also directly write to CM to raise their concerns regarding implementation of the projects. 
References
— Press Release in Himachal Pradesh – http://himachalpr.gov.in/PressRelease.aspx
— Contact CM Office – http://himpragati.nic.in/CMOffice/index.html
— In case of any difficulty, investors can contact at the helpline number : +91 177 2625400 or +91 177 2621154 or can send an e-mail at cm-hp[at]nic[dot]in
— For more details, visit the official website http://himpragati.nic.in/

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has raised the financial assistance under Mukhyamantri Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana. Now, the state govt. would provide an assistance amount of Rs. 5 lakh instead of previous Rs. 30,000. CM Jai Ram Thakur has also launched 3 other health scheme namely Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Rahat Kosh Yojana, HP Universal Health Protection Scheme and Telemedicine scheme for Pangi in Chamba district.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has raised the financial assistance under Mukhyamantri Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana. Now, the state govt. would provide an assistance amount of Rs. 5 lakh instead of previous Rs. 30,000. CM Jai Ram Thakur has also launched 3 other health scheme namely Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Rahat Kosh Yojana, HP Universal Health Protection Scheme and Telemedicine scheme for Pangi in Chamba district. 
HP govt. has inaugurated OPD / IPD, Trauma Centre of Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri government medical college, Ner Chowk and Nursing College at Ner Chowk in Mandi district. CM Jai Ram Thakur has also announced to open Atal Medical and Research University in Ner Chowk medical college. 
HP govt. has increased the monthly salary of contractual medical officers by Rs. 10,000 p.m and that of contractual specialist medical officers by Rs. 15,000 per month.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Mukhamantri Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana in Himachal Pradesh
All the citizens of Himachal Pradesh will now get an enhanced assistance under Mukhyamantri Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana through 175 registered government and private health institutes. The financial assistance has been raised from an existing provision of Rs. 30,000 to 5 lakh for treatment in all these hospitals. This scheme will cover those beneficiaries who are not covered under Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY) and other health protection schemes. 
CM Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana will include senior citizens above 80 years of age, single women (widow, divorced, abandoned, missing husband and unmarried), disabled persons with more than 70% disability, anganwadi workers / assistants, part-time employees, daily wage workers, contractual employees of Himachal pradesh and mid-day meal workers.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

People of the state would now get specialised medical and emergency services round the clock. The state govt. will provide financial assistance from Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Rahat Kosh to the patients who are not covered under social security pension scheme. 

मंडी प्रवास के दौरान मेडिकल कॉलेज नेरचौक में टेलीमेडिसिन सेंटर्स, बजट घोषणा के अनुरूप " मुख्यमंत्री चिकित्सा राहत कोष" योजना और यूनिवर्सल हेल्थ प्रोटेक्शन ( अतिरिक्त लाभ) योजना का शुभारंभ किया। इसके लिए प्रदेशवासियों को हार्दिक बधाई एवं शुभकामनाएं । pic.twitter.com/v8n624LSlI
— Jairam Thakur (@jairamthakurbjp) October 20, 2018

Under Himachal Pradesh Universal Health Protection Scheme, govt. will provide facility for free treatment upto Rs. 5 lakh to all the citizens. CM has also announced to provide Rs. 30 lakh for the construction of Mukhya Mantri Bhawan in Balh constitutency and to upgrade middle school Sarkidhar to high school. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Universal Health Protection Scheme to provide free treatment upto Rs. 5 lakh to all the citizens. CM Jai Ram Thakur launches the Ayushman Bharat – PM Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY) in Himachal Pradesh to provide assistance for secondary and tertiary hospitalization without any restriction of age, family size and income. Interested candidates can visit the official website at https://hpuhps.com/
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Universal Health Protection Scheme to provide free treatment upto Rs. 5 lakh to all the citizens. CM Jai Ram Thakur launches the Ayushman Bharat – PM Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY) in Himachal Pradesh to provide assistance for secondary and tertiary hospitalization without any restriction of age, family size and income. Interested candidates can visit the official website at https://hpuhps.com/
HP Chief Minister has also started 3 other schemes namely Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Raahat Kosh Yojana, Mukhya Mantri Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana and Telemedicine scheme for Pangi in Chamba district on 20 October 2018. 
Latest Update – Check Ayushman Bharat Yojana List of Hospitals to find PM Jan Arogya Yojana empanelled hospitals.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

At the launch event, CM has also inaugurated OPD / IPD, Trauma Centre of Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri government medical college, Ner Chowk, and Nursing College at Ner Chowk in Mandi district.
Himachal Pradesh Universal Health Protection Scheme
Ayushman Bharat – PM Jan Arogya Yojana is a flagship scheme of the Modi govt. to provide health insurance coverage of Rs. 5 lakh to people from deprived sections. All those people whose name appears in the SECC 2011 list will get free insurance coverage of Rs. 5 lakh for secondary and tertiary hospitalization. Interested candidates can apply online at https://hpuhps.com/ for Universal Health Protection scheme. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

People can check their name in the Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana final beneficiaries list and avail free treatment at 175 registered govt. and private empanelled hospitals in the state. This scheme is to ensure the vision of “Health for All” in the state. PMJAY scheme will be implemented in Himachal Pradesh in trust based mode and there is no enrollment required to avail the scheme benefits.
Universal Health Protection Scheme will subsume the Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY) in the state. Moreover, all those citizens who are not covered under this scheme will get included in the Mukhyamantri Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana in which they will get an increased assistance upto Rs. 5 lakh (previously Rs. 30,000). 

मेडिकल कॉलेज नेरचौक में टेलीमेडिसिन सेंटर्स,"मुख्यमंत्री चिकित्सा राहत कोष" योजना और यूनिवर्सल हेल्थ प्रोटेक्शन योजना के शुभारंभ के पश्चात यहाँ भारी जनसमूह को सम्बोधित किया ।स्थानीय जनता को हार्दिक बधाई ।#शिखरकीओरहिमाचल pic.twitter.com/SiwlMcuBzo
— Jairam Thakur (@jairamthakurbjp) October 20, 2018

The state govt. has also launched Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Rahat Kosh Yojana to provide financial assistance to the citizens who are not covered under the social security pension scheme and people will get specialised medical and emergency services round the clock. 
CM Jai Ram Thakur has also announced to open Atal Medical and Research University in Ner Chowk medical college. The state govt. will enhance the monthly pay of medical officers appointed on contract basis by Rs. 10,000 per month and that of specialist medical officers on contract basis by Rs. 15,000 per month.

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched 4 new health schemes namely Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Raahat Kosh Yojana, Mukhya Mantri Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana, Himachal Pradesh Universal Health Protection Scheme and Telemedicine scheme for Pangi in Chamba district. HP govt. is going to provide assistance to patients who are not included in the social security pension scheme.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched 4 new health schemes namely Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Raahat Kosh Yojana, Mukhya Mantri Rajya Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana, Himachal Pradesh Universal Health Protection Scheme and Telemedicine scheme for Pangi in Chamba district. HP govt. is going to provide assistance to patients who are not included in the social security pension scheme. 
CM Jai Ram Thakur has inaugurated OPD / IPD, Trauma Centre of Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri government medical college, Ner Chowk and Nursing College at Ner Chowk in Mandi district. CM has also announced to open Atal Medical and Research University in Ner Chowk medical college. 
HP govt. is going to enhance the monthly pay of medical officers appointed on contract basis by Rs. 10,000 p.m and that of specialist medical officers on contract basis by Rs. 15,000 per month. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Raahat Kosh Yojana
Under Mukhyamantri Chikitsa Rahat Kosh Yojana, the citizens would be able to get 24*7 specialised medical and emergency services. The state govt. will provide financial assistance to all those patients who were not covered under the social security pension scheme.

"मुख्यमंत्री चिकित्सा राहत कोष योजना" शुरू करने के साथ योजना के तहत विभिन्न लाभार्थियों को निर्धारित राशि के चेक वितरित किए।मरीज व्यक्ति के उपचार के लिए केंद्र सरकार एवं हमारी प्रदेश सरकार ने कल्याणकारी योजनाएं शुरू की हैं। जनता से आग्रह है कि इन योजनाओं का भरपूर लाभ उठाएं। pic.twitter.com/PeQOLENTOz


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

— Jairam Thakur (@jairamthakurbjp) October 20, 2018

HP govt. will also facilitate the people by enhancing the assistance amount under Mukhyamantri Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana from Rs. 30,000 to Rs. 5 lakh. Now citizens can avail treatment under Mukhya Mantri Swasthya Dekhbhal Yojana at 175 registered government and private health institutes.
Under Himachal Pradesh Universal Health Protection Scheme, each person from economically weaker sections can avail free treatment upto Rs. 5 lakh in any govt. or private empanelled hospitals. 
HP CM has also laid the foundation stones of staff quarters of Civil hospital Sundernangar and an overhead foot bridge at Lalit chowk in Sundernagar. The state govt. will also provide digital X-Ray machines for the hospital and will enhance the bed capacity from 100 to 150 beds.
HP govt. will also spend Rs. 30 lakh for the construction of Mukhya Mantri Bhawan in Balh Constituency and upgrading Middle School Sarkidhar to High School.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh CM Jai Ram Thakur has launched HP MyGov Portal at himachal.mygov.in. Now people can make HP My Gov Portal Registration / Login 2020 at the official website. This portal will go a long way in strengthening public participation in governance process. Himachal My Gov Portal is an innovative platform to build partnership b/w citizens and government with usage of technology for growth and development of India. गतिविधियाँ – समूह, कार्यों, चर्चाओं, जनमत, ब्लॉग और विशेष चर्चाओं मे भाग लेकर राष्ट्र निर्माण का हिस्सा बनें और इसमें अपना योगदान दें!
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh CM Jai Ram Thakur has launched HP MyGov Portal at himachal.mygov.in. Now people can make HP My Gov Portal Registration / Login 2020 at the official website. This portal will go a long way in strengthening public participation in governance process. Himachal My Gov Portal is an innovative platform to build partnership b/w citizens and government with usage of technology for growth and development of India. गतिविधियाँ – समूह, कार्यों, चर्चाओं, जनमत, ब्लॉग और विशेष चर्चाओं मे भाग लेकर राष्ट्र निर्माण का हिस्सा बनें और इसमें अपना योगदान दें!
The My Gov Himachal Portal will enable people to communicate with govt. by providing their views, suggestions, feedback and discontentment. HP state govt. will take appropriate measures on constructive criticism and will synergize all contributions for betterment of Himachal Pradesh.
The salient features of Himachal My Gov Portal are discussions, polls, tasks, talks and blogs on several groups based on diverse governance and public policy issues.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP My Gov Portal Registration / Login at himachal.mygov.in
Here is the complete process to make registration and login at the Himachal Pradesh My Gov Portal:-

Firstly visit the official website at himachal.mygov.in
At the homepage, click at the “पंजीकरण करें” link in the main menu to open the HP My Gov Portal Registration Form as shown below:-
Himachal My Gov Portal Registration Form
Here candidates can make registration using their social media profile as on facebook, google, twitter, linkedin or can enter their details to create a new account.

All the new users can then make login and the login page will appear as shown below:-
Himachal MyGov Portal Login Form
It is important to note that users with @ gov.in or @ nic.in ID can directly login with their e-mail Id and passowrd.

After making login, all the candidates can participate in various activities at the portal (as mentioned below) and communicate with the HP government. Previously, the state govt. had already launched HP Mukhyamantri Seva Sankalp Helpline Number to establish 2 way communication between citizens and government.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Activities at Himachal My Gov Portal

समूह – आपकी रूचि के विषय
कार्य – ऑनलाइन और बाहरी कार्य करें
चर्चा – समूह और चर्चा में भाग लें
जनमत – जनमत का हिस्सा बनें
ब्लॉग – मेरी सरकार की नवीनतम गतिविधयों के बारे में पढ़ें
वार्ता – सुशासन पर हुई विशेष चर्चा सुनें

To directly connect to chief minister of Himachal Pradesh, a new CM App is also launched.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched HP Akhand Shiksha Jyoti – Mere School Se Nikle Moti scheme to honour govt. school alumni. Under this scheme, names of old students would be written on ‘Roll of Honour board’ to be displayed in the respective schools to motivate students to work hard and excel in life. Himachal Pradesh is performing well in the field of education and the state has emerged as second state in the country after Kerala in highest literacy rate.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched HP Akhand Shiksha Jyoti – Mere School Se Nikle Moti scheme to honour govt. school alumni. Under this scheme, names of old students would be written on ‘Roll of Honour board’ to be displayed in the respective schools to motivate students to work hard and excel in life. Himachal Pradesh is performing well in the field of education and the state has emerged as second state in the country after Kerala in highest literacy rate.
CM Jai Ram Thakur launches Akhand Shiksha Jyoti – Mere School Se Nikle Moti scheme from government senior secondary school Bagsiad, in Seraj area of Mandi district. Those students of Himachal Pradesh who have earned name in different walks of life will be honoured.
The chief minister also released the booklet on “Guidelines” on this scheme which is brought out by DIET Mandi.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Akhand Shiksha Jyoti – Mere School Se Nikle Moti Scheme
Himachal Pradesh has made a rapid stride in education as the state has educational institutions even in the remotest areas of state. CM has launched Akhand Shiksha Jyoti – Mere School Se Nikle Moti scheme in govt. school, Bagsiad, where once he was a student. Old students names would be written on the “Roll of Honour board” to motivate current batch students to take inspiration from these alumni.
CM announced metalling of roads which leads to the school and announced assistance of Rs. 10 lakh for expansion of school ground. A stadium is also going to be constructed in the school. CM announced Rs. 1 crore to construct an additional building in Bagsiad school and also announced 10 solar lights for Bagsiad bazaar.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

The state govt. will provide an assistance of Rs. 51000 for the school in his personal capacity. CM will also provide Rs. 31,000 from his discretionary fund for students performing cultural programme at the occasion. Schools and teachers plays a major role to shape careers of individuals and thus every individual needs to repay back to the institution as gratitude.
CM has also honoured the old students whose name was written on the “School Roll of Honour Board” under this scheme. This scheme aims to motivate students to work hard to achieve new heights in their life. Old students who have excelled in various fields should contribute for development and strengthening of their schools. 
Himachal Pradesh Medha Protsahan Yojana
The state govt. has started HP Medha Protsahan Yojana to provide coaching facility to 500 meritorious students to prepare for competitive exams like IAS, HAS, NEET, JEE,IIT etc. Under this scheme, govt. will provide Rs. 1 lakh to each student for coaching purposes. This scheme will strengthen institutions to contribute in shaping life of students of these institutions to perform better. 
HP govt. has also started nursery classes in govt. schools as it is felt that due to non-availability of nursery classes, parents were admitting their children in private schools. This scheme will motivate parents to admit their children in government schools.
CM has also provided free gas connections to the beneficiaries of Mukhyamantri Grahini Suvidha Yojana. GSY Scheme will result in women empowerment and also a pollution free environment in HP with an outlay of Rs. 12 crore. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. is going to provide free stainless steel water bottles to 90,000 govt. school students studying in class 9th in the state. This decision will discourage the usage of plastic bottles as the state govt. has imposed ban on the plastic items, thermocol plates, polythene & glasses. The initiative will be funded under Mukhya Mantri Vardi Yojana – free school uniform scheme.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. is going to provide free stainless steel water bottles to 90,000 govt. school students studying in class 9th in the state. This decision will discourage the usage of plastic bottles as the state govt. has imposed ban on the plastic items, thermocol plates, polythene & glasses. The initiative will be funded under Mukhya Mantri Vardi Yojana – free school uniform scheme. 
HP govt. has initiated the process of distribution of steel water bottles to IX class govt. school students. On 11 October 2018, CM will attend a high level meeting comprising of the officials of education, dept. of food & public distribution and dept. of environment. Govt. will purchase stainless steel water bottles through the medium of dept. of food and public distribution and environment dept. will allocate budget.
CM has made this announcement to distribute free steel water bottles on 5 June 2018 at the occasion of World Environment Day. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Free Steel Water Bottles for 90,000 Govt. School Students in HP
CM Jai Ram Thakur announced that free stainless steel water bottles would be provided to around 90,000 class IX students in govt. schools to discourage the use of plastic bottles. This decision is in accordance with the recent Himachal Pradesh plastic ban notification which impose ban on plastic bags, polythene, thermocol plates and plastic made glasses as these materials causes pollution. The state govt. has also banned plastic water bottles of less than one-litre capacity at official functions.
The state govt. has realized the severity of plastic bag usage in daily life and how it contributed in polluting the environment. The current water crisis has its roots in the usage of plastic and its discriminate dumping in rivers. This distribution of steel water bottles will ensure that plastic and thermocol usage is reduced which in turn would lead to reduction in pollution.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

This decision to provide free steel water bottles for 90k govt. school students will be implemented in phases. In the first phase, only class 9th students would be covered which would be extended to other classes in later phases. In the next phases, govt. will cover the students of other classes as well and dept. of education is preparing a proposal for that purpose. Department of food and public distribution will invite tenders for the purchase of stainless steel bottles.

पर्यावरण संरक्षण में प्लास्टिक की बोतल पर प्रतिबंध लगाने के ऐतिहासिक निर्णय के बाद अब माननीय मुख्यमंत्री @jairamthakurbjp जी के नेतृत्व में हिमाचल प्रदेश भाजपा सरकार प्रदेश के सरकारी स्कूलों में पढ़ रहे 90 हजार बच्चों को स्टील की बोतलें निःशुल्क उपलब्ध करवाएगी। pic.twitter.com/F8OfVqmTk6
— BJP Himachal Pradesh (@BJP4Himachal) October 7, 2018

There is a proposal to set up 10 solid waste management plants for scientific disposal of waste. A polythene shredder machine will also be installed in Sundernagar and Ghumarwin town. Recently, there was a severe shortage of water in Shimla due to pollution and degradation of water catchment areas, rivers and water bodies. So, pollution reducing plants would be developed in state nurseries and will be provided to the people for plantation. CM Jairam Thakur has also requested tourists visiting the state to use jute or paper bags instead of polythene bags. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has approved Dev Bhoomi Darshan Yojana for senior citizens to make them visit sacred places in the state. Under this scheme, all the senior citizens in the age group of 70 to 80 years will get 50% discount while travelling in buses to holy places. All the elderly citizens above 80 years will get 100% discount in buses i.e they will not have to pay any fare under Dev Bhumi Darshan Yojana.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has approved Dev Bhoomi Darshan Yojana for senior citizens to make them visit sacred places in the state. Under this scheme, all the senior citizens in the age group of 70 to 80 years will get 50% discount while travelling in buses to holy places. All the elderly citizens above 80 years will get 100% discount in buses i.e they will not have to pay any fare under Dev Bhumi Darshan Yojana. 
The state govt. has also approved to increase the old age pension amount for ex-servicemen or war widows from Rs. 500 to Rs. 3000. The state govt. has also approved to start Vigyan Gram Yojana in 5 districts. This scheme will start in Chamba, Kullu, Mandi, Shimla, Sirmaur districts in the state to boost agricultural production, non-farming activities and to preserve available resources. 
For water conservation and rainwater harvesting, govt. has started “Jal se Krishi Ko Bal Yojana”. The state govt. has allocated a budgetary provision of Rs. 250 crore for this scheme. To encourage tourism, govt. has started “Aaj Purani Raaho Se” Yojana. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Dev Bhoomi Darshan Yojana for Senior Citizens
The important features and highlights of Dev Bhumi Darshan Yojana are as follows:-

The state govt. will provide relief in travel expenses to senior citizens to enable them to visit sacred places in the state.
All the senior citizens between the age group of 70 to 80 years will get 50% discount in buses while travelling to dev bhumi.
In addition to this, senior citizens who are 80 years or above in age will get full 100% discount in bus travel. They will not have to bear any expense while travelling to holy places under Dev Bhoomi Darshan Yojana.
HP Dev Bhumi Darshan Yojana

Various other decisions were also taken in the cabinet meeting held on 24 September 2018. In Fire Department, govt. would fill 2 posts for station fire officers, 3 posts for driver-cum-pump operator, 20 firemen posts on contractual basis. In forest department, the state govt. has approved to fill 123 forest guards posts. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

A total number of 35 assistant professors / equivalent posts are approved for Dr. Y.S. Parmar University of Horticulture & Forestry. Honorarium for school teachers appointed by the School Management Committee is now increased by 20% per month and this amount is implemented w.e.f from 1 August 2018. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Anubhav Yojana in Kullu district on 4 September 2018. Under this scheme, all the citizens can now Book Appointment with Doctors Online even while sitting at their home. This would be done on the basis of a Token System and people can fix their timings to meet doctors easily. The main tagline of this scheme is “One Step Towards Digital Health”.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Anubhav Yojana in Kullu district on 4 September 2018. Under this scheme, all the citizens can now Book Appointment with Doctors Online even while sitting at their home. This would be done on the basis of a Token System and people can fix their timings to meet doctors easily. The main tagline of this scheme is “One Step Towards Digital Health”. 
Now after the launch of Anubhav Yojana in the district, all the people will not have to stand in queue at the hospitals. Rather they can just book appointment (parchi) for OPD online. This would save lots of time which could have been wasted if the people stand in lines at the hospitals.
In the initial phase, the state govt. has started this facility for the Kullu district only. But soon it will be launched in other districts as well. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Anubhav Yojana – Book Appointment with Doctors Online
Under this scheme, people in Kullu district can avail Digital Health facilities and get appointment with doctors from their home. Under Anubhav Yojana, citizens can get e-receipt (parchi) to meet doctors by making online registrations through Asha workers or health workers of Rural health department. People can then meet the specialized doctor at the time fixed in the appointment and avail treatment for their disease.
Himachal Pradesh Anubhav Yojana Book Appointment Doctors Online
This will provide easy and timely access to proper treatment to the people and will ensure good health of the citizens. All the citizens who have made online registrations for appointment under Anubhav Yojana will also get an SMS. This SMS will be sent to confirm the appointment (date and timings) details. This scheme will benefit 4.5 lakh people in the Kullu district. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Anubhav Yojana will also assist people in case the date or timings to meet the doctor are changed. Then they will get the message (SMS) on their registered mobile number regarding the change in date or time. This scheme will enable people to take suggestions and advice from the doctors directly at their fixed timings without any delay.
It is a hassle free process and people will not have to roam here and there and make unnecessary visits at the hospitals to get treatment. CM Jai Ram Thakur has received a warm welcome from the people of Kullu district. On this occasion, Yunus (DC Kullu) and CMO Dr. Sushil Chandra along with other officers were present.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Alpsankhyak Kalyan Yojana 2018. Under this scheme, HP govt. will provide financial assistance for the marriage of muslim girls, medical treatment to poor muslim families and to provide social security pension to old, widows and disabled people of minority communities. This amount will be given through the Waqf Board.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Alpsankhyak Kalyan Yojana 2018. Under this scheme, HP govt. will provide financial assistance for the marriage of muslim girls, medical treatment to poor muslim families and to provide social security pension to old, widows and disabled people of minority communities. This amount will be given through the Waqf Board. 
The state govt. is committed for the welfare and development of minorities sections of the society. This would enable the minority section to get equal opportunities for development purpose. 
CM Jairam Thakur has made this announcement while addressing a gathering in Chamba after the launch of HP Mukhyamantri Alpsankhyak Kalyan Yojana on 6 August 2018.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Mukhyamantri Alpsankhyak Kalyan Yojana 2018
The important features and highlights of this HP CM Minority Welfare Scheme are as follows:-

Marriage Grant to Muslim Girls (Rs. 25,000) – The state govt. is going to provide Rs. 25000 as marriage assistance for the girls belonging to the poor Muslim families.
Medical Treatment to Poor Muslim Families (Rs. 5,000) – HP govt. will provide financial assistance of Rs. 5000 for medical treatment of any poor Muslim family.
Social Security Pension to Old, Widow and Disabled Muslims (Rs. 400 p.m) – The state govt. will provide Rs. 400 per month as social security pension to old, widow and disabled people from Muslim community.

Minority people plays an important role in the overall development of the society. All the financial assistance would be provided to the beneficiaries through the Waqf Board.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Age Limit For Social Security Pension Reduced
Previously, the state govt. has also reduce the age limit to avail social security scheme benefits. The cabinet committee has decided that the age limit for Social Security Pension is now 70 years (previously 80 years). This decision has benefited around 1.3 lakh Old Age citizens. 
The state govt. is going to provide necessary facilities for Muslim Graveyard – Kabristan. HP govt. will allocate land to the Waqf Board to build new burial places where Muslims can be buried after their deaths. For this purpose, deputy commissioners have been asked to find adequate spaces. Some other important announcements were also made during the launch event of Mukhyamantri Alpsankhyak Kalyan Yojana in Himachal Pradesh. 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Nai Raahein Nai Manzilien Scheme to diversify tourism. Under this scheme, the state govt. of HP will identify unexplored and untapped tourist destinations. This scheme will promote tourism in these tourist places located across the countryside particularly focusing on rural areas. The total budgetary allocation of Nai Rahen Nai Manzil Scheme is Rs. 50 crore.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Nai Raahein Nai Manzilien Scheme to diversify tourism. Under this scheme, the state govt. of HP will identify unexplored and untapped tourist destinations. This scheme will promote tourism in these tourist places located across the countryside particularly focusing on rural areas. The total budgetary allocation of Nai Rahen Nai Manzil Scheme is Rs. 50 crore. 
CM Jai Ram Thakur has made this announcement while presiding over the Review Meeting of Himachal Pradesh Tourism Department. HP govt. will select circuits for infrastructure development and will carry out various developmental works in these circuits under Nai Rahen Nai Manzil Scheme. 
In addition, govt. will develop one particular destination in every selected circuit as an ideal and unique tourist destination. This will attract tourists fro different places which in turn will diversify tourism.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Pradesh Nai Raahein Nai Manzilien Scheme Circuits
Tourism Dept. has prepared 9 circuits under Nai Rahen Nai Manzil Scheme 2018. The names of these 9 circuits are as follows:-

Jogindernagar-Barot-Kothi Kohar-Rajgungja-Bir-Billing
Sundernagar-Chail Chowk-Kamru Nag-Shikari Devi-Janjheli
Shimla-Khara Pathar-Rohru-Sandasu-Larot-Chanshal-Dodra Kwar
Dhauladhar Circuit
Buddhist Circuit
Bhakra-Bilaspur-Sundernagar-Jogindernagar-Pong Dam
Solan-Habban-Rajgarh-Shillai
Manali-Rohtan-Tandi-Udaipur-Killar
Narkanda-Baghi-Khadrala-Chini (Kalpa)-Pangi Circuit

A committee of Tourism, PWD, Forests, Language, Art and Culture Officers will make a visit to the selected circuits. This committee will propose the activities which needs to be carried out in these circuits after consulting the local panchayats and other stakeholders.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Works / Activities – HP Nai Rahen Nai Manzil Scheme
HP govt. will carry out various developmental activities in these unexplored and untapped tourist places to diversify tourism. Infrastructure development and other facilities will be the primary focus. These activities are as follows:- 


Parks
Toilets
Rain Shelters
Street Paths
Solid Waste Improvement


Walking Trails
Beautification of Temples
Landscaping
Sarais
Community Halls


Trekkers Hostel
Roads Widening
Signals & Traffic Directions
Parkings
Lighting & Dustbins


The state govt. will encourage Home Stays through private parties, Nature Walks, Eco-Trails, Treks, Hikes, Trips to Orchards etc.
He said that this would also generate employment opportunities by way of promotion of local cuisines, Folk artist, Local Artisans, Tour Guides, Eco-Guides, Adventure Guides etc.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Mother’s Absolute Affection Scheme for pregnant and lactating mothers. Mother’s Milk in the first hour of birth and exclusive breastfeeding for first 6 months thereafter is very important for children well being. MAA Programme 2018 under National Health Mission will create awareness in the general public and this breastfeeding programme will also reduce under 5 mortality rate of children.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Mother’s Absolute Affection Scheme for pregnant and lactating mothers. Mother’s Milk in the first hour of birth and exclusive breastfeeding for first 6 months thereafter is very important for children well being. MAA Programme 2018 under National Health Mission will create awareness in the general public and this breastfeeding programme will also reduce under 5 mortality rate of children.
Breastfeeding is a natural, low cost and important intervention and every child must have access to it. MAA Programme targets at pregnant and lactating mothers through trained healthcare providers and skilled community health workers. 
As per the reports data, around 13% of children death occurs due to poor breastfeeding. MAA programme will create a suitable eco-system to provide proper info. to mothers, husbands and other family members.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Components of MAA Programme 2018
The important component of Mother’s Absolute Affection Programme in Himachal Pradesh are as follows:-

Community awareness generation.
Strengthening inter personal communication through ASHA.
Skilled support for breastfeeding at delivery points in public health facilities.
Monitoring and Award/recognition.
Maa Programme PDF Components

Breastfeeding is helpful in creation of special bond between baby and mother. Mother’s milk also improves behaviour, speech, security and how child relates to other people. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

MAA Programme 2018 in HP – National Health Mission
All the national health indicators like Infant Mortality Rate (IMR), Maternal Maternity Rate (MMR), Total Fertility Rate (TFR) and under five mortality rate shows decline in the previous years. Health Ministry ‘Strategic approach to Reproductive Maternal, Newborn, Child and Adolescent health (RMNCH+A) is focusing on all life stages. Breastfeeding prevents children from disease, poverty and death and will bring physical and social development.
Husband and other family members must support women for breastfeeding which will provide essential nutrients to child. MAA Programme 2018 will focus on efforts to promote, protect and support optimal breastfeeding and will also provide counselling on child feeding through health systems. As per official data, early breastfeeding will prevent 20% newborn deaths and 13% under 5 children deaths. 
This sensitization programme involves allopathic, doctors, Ayush Doctors, Auxiliary Nurse Midwives (ANMs), Anganwadi Workers (AWs) to implement proper breastfeeding. Candidates can see more details on Mother’s Absolute Affection Scheme through the link – MAA Programme PDF 





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

SAVE AS PDF

title: Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Nutrition Scheme for HIV Positive children. Under this scheme, all the youths up to 18 years of age will get nutrition supplements to boost their immunity. Accordingly, all the children who are tested positive for HIV can avail the benefits of this scheme.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh govt. has launched Nutrition Scheme for HIV Positive children. Under this scheme, all the youths up to 18 years of age will get nutrition supplements to boost their immunity. Accordingly, all the children who are tested positive for HIV can avail the benefits of this scheme.
This scheme will enable HIV affected children to lead a normal and healthy life. Himachal CM has launched this initiative on an awareness campaign organized by HP State AIDS Control Society.
Furthermore, HP govt. is also going to make HIV testing of every expectant mother compulsory from current Financial Year. It is necessary as the number of AIDS cases has increased to 5700 in HP state. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Pradesh Nutrition Scheme
The important features and highlights of this scheme are as follows:-

This nutrition scheme will provide nutrition supplements to the children tested HIV positive.
Subsequently, CM launches this scheme for HIV affected children during a state level awareness campaign on the occasion of National Youth Day.
Accordingly, it will boost immunity of 400 HIV positive youths up to 18 years of age.
In addition to this, govt. will provide assistance to such children for a better and healthy life.
Furthermore, every expectant mother will have to compulsorily pass the HIV Test so that the virus does not get transmitted to the baby.

AIDS is a serious concern for the state govt. as the number of cases had risen to 5700 in the previous year. Moreover, govt. will lay special emphasis on spreading awareness about this disease at village level in rural and remote areas. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Health dept. along with the help of NGOs and individuals must supplement the efforts to create awareness about HIV. Accordingly, govt. will start an awareness campaign in various schools and colleges. In addition to this, special focus is on organizing plays, street shows to effectively communicate with the masses.

title: The state government of Himachal Pradesh Government is implementing the Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme (SCHIS) in the state. The objective of this insurance scheme is to provide easy access to various health services by providing an insurance cover to all senior citizen (above the age of 60 years).
full_text:
The state government of Himachal Pradesh Government is implementing the Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme (SCHIS) in the state. The objective of this insurance scheme is to provide easy access to various health services by providing an insurance cover to all senior citizen (above the age of 60 years).
Under Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme (SCHIS), the government will provide top-up coverage of up to Rs. 30,000 per senior citizen in the state. This scheme will cover all senior citizens who are the smart card holders of Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojna (RSBY). Moreover, if there are more than 1 senior citizen in a RSBY rolled family, the additional insurance coverage in multiples of Rs. 30,000 per senior citizen will be provided on floater basis.
In other words, if there are two senior citizens in a family then cover of Rs. 60,000 would be accessible on a floater basis to each the senior citizen.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Highlights of Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme (SCHIS)
Below are some of the main features / highlights of the SCHIS

The benefit of SCHIS is available to senior citizen (above 60 years).
The candidate should be Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojna (RSBY) smart card holder.
The beneficiary has to pay only a nominal annual premium for SCHIS which is up to Rs. 500 per family.
Moreover, Central and State government will share the insurance premium in the ratio of 90:10 under the Trust Model.
In addition, the state government will not issue any separate enrollment process. The beneficiary will be selected only among the smart card holders of RSBY.
The beneficiary can take health care services by showing their health card into any of the RSBY empaneled hospitals.
All the financial transactions between government and insurance company will be done through bank channel. Apart from this, the unspent fund will be refunded at the closing of the financial year.

The candidates can check the name of nearly hospital by clicking on the below link
RSBY Empaneled hospitals


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Surgical Packages List
Ministry of health and Family Welfare has prepared a separate list of the surgical packages that costs more than Rs 30,000. Below given is the list of those packages



Surgical Oncology
Cardiothoracic Surgery


Poly-Trauma and Repair
Neuro Surgery


Medical Oncology
Cardiology


Burns
Cardiovascular Surgery



The beneficiary can avail cashless treatment in any of the RSBY empaneled hospitals under Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme (SCHIS). Moreover, the government is also providing two additional covers that will be compensated from existing top-up of RSBY for critical care up to Rs. 1.75 lakh in addition up to Rs. 2.25 lakh for cancer. 
The trust/ society will receive the claims directly from the hospitals. Subsequently, these trusts will settle these claims on the basis of the package rates defined by the Central govt. Furthermore, state govt. will borne the expenses for IEC and other certain expenses.
The Trust Model will get all claims directly from the hospitals, not to the beneficiary and will settle claims in accordance with the defined package rates.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: The govt. of Himachal Pradesh has launched “Electronic Health Card Scheme” in the state. The vision of scheme is to provide ‘LIVEWIRE’ that connect patients and their family members with the hospitals for cure of diseases.
full_text:
The govt. of Himachal Pradesh has launched “Electronic Health Card Scheme” in the state. The vision of scheme is to provide ‘LIVEWIRE’ that connect patients and their family members with the hospitals for cure of diseases.
Under Universal Immunization Programme (UIP), the state govt. also announced a new scheme that provide free insulin to diabetic patients below 18 years of age in all districts of HP state. After the launching of the scheme Himachal Pradesh has become first state in South East Asia region to do so.
The candidates could download health card app from google app store by searching its name “Health Card HP”. This app provide all facilities and information regarding electronic health card. To install and login on this app, follow the below mentioned procedure.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Download & Use ‘Health Card HP’ Android App
STEP 1: Go to Google play store in your android phone or visit the URL https://play.google.com.
STEP 2: Search for “Health Card HP” or click this link.
STEP 3: Then click on “INSTALL”.
STEP 4: The app will be downloaded and installed in your android phone.
STEP 5: Make your login as service provider or as an individual.
STEP 6: Now choose one option from ‘Aadhaar Card’, ‘UID’ and ‘Mobile Number’
STEP 7: Enter necessary information
STEP 6: Now to use all the functions of this application.
Health Card HP App
The Chief minister of the state has also launched more new health schemes along with electronic health card scheme. The main purpose of the schemes is to bring improvement in health and provide timely delivery of services to patients across the state.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

List of New Health Scheme

A health bulletin brochure
HP Universal Health Protection Scheme
Free treatment of Hemophiliac patients
Measles Rubella (MR) campaign
Free insulin to diabetic patients

Under the Universal Heath Scheme, state government will cover all citizens belonging to Himachal Pradesh. The scheme would strengthen the health services in the state.
