title: The state government of Himachal Pradesh has started the initiative of providing quality food at very low cost under the scheme named as Rajiv Thali Yojana. Under a similar scheme named as “Amma Canteens”, Tamil Nadu government is providing subsidy on food. But Rajiv Thali Yojana is different from Amma Canteens, through this scheme, the government is providing a thali (Plate of food) with two rotis, a bowl of dal, sabzi and rice at just Rs. 25.
full_text:
The state government of Himachal Pradesh has started the initiative of providing quality food at very low cost under the scheme named as Rajiv Thali Yojana. Under a similar scheme named as “Amma Canteens”, Tamil Nadu government is providing subsidy on food. But Rajiv Thali Yojana is different from Amma Canteens, through this scheme, the government is providing a thali (Plate of food) with two rotis, a bowl of dal, sabzi and rice at just Rs. 25.
A plan is being introduced by the government to provide food under this scheme at all the bus stands in the state. The idea of introducing the scheme on bus stands was given by transport minister of Himachal Pradesh, G S Bali. Once the scheme is implemented at bus stands, the passengers traveling by Himachal Road Transport Corporation (HRTC) buses, will not face the problems of getting food from overcharging dhabas where buses halted during the journey.
Rajiv Thali Yojana
After the success of Rajiv Thali Yojana, the concerned department is targeting to provide quality food the passengers of Volvo buses. The price of a single thali would be bit higher for Volvo bus passengers. The department is working on the task of identifying the places where the facility could be stated for Volvo buses.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HRTC minster said that, initially, it was difficult for the transport department to find contractors to run the scheme who saw no or marginal profit. In the beginning, nobody had come forward, forcing us to issue the advertisement twice. But now the situations has been changed as they tied-up with unemployed youth and cooperative societies to run the canteens.
As per the information, if a person sells 500 thali in a day then he would save Rs. 2 per plate and his daily income would be Rs. 1,000. In the beginning the main target of Rajiv Thali Yojana at identified bus stands is to end the complaints of overcharging at dhabas. To keep the price of a thali nominal, the government is providing only required infrastructures to run the scheme. Besides, to ensure the food quality at these canteens, HRTC has provided space and HP Civil Supplies Corporation provides utensils under CSR initiative.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Apart from providing food at nominal rates, drinking water packages are also being provided to the customers at Rs. 5 on no-profit basis. Officials of HP Civil Supplies Corporation and HRTC have been assigned a task of ensuring the quality of food in these canteens.
Rajiv Thali Yojana is currently active in few bus stands including, Palampur and Dharamshala of Kangra district, Una and Mandi while it would be made available at identified bus stands of remaining nine districts shortly.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh Government has launched a new scheme for the new industrial startup seeking the exempt of new units from inspection for up to 3 years. The scheme has been launched in order to promote new ideas, products, and processes for commercialization and industry.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh Government has launched a new scheme for the new industrial startup seeking the exempt of new units from inspection for up to 3 years. The scheme has been launched in order to promote new ideas, products, and processes for commercialization and industry.
State government under the CM startup scheme will provide liberal and financial assistance of up to Rs. 30 Lakh per per incubator organization per year up to a period of three years. Incubator organizations designed to promote growth of start–up units and having physical space, coaching and mentor facilities will be provided these assistance.
Under the scheme, the government would accept self attested certificates for all official purposes in order to ease the whole process for startups. Self attested certificates will help startup units sustain and work without formalities and obstacles.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Main Benefits of CM Startup Scheme
Below are some of the main benefits being provided to startup industries 

No inspection of new industrial units for three years.
Liberal and financial assistance to incubator organizations.
Self-attested certificates enough for official formalities.
Strengthened single window system for approval of industry.
Reduced stamp duty by 3 percent for start-up units.
Allotment of plots on 50 per cent of rates as fixed by the industries department.

Himachal Pradesh government is already doing a lot for the ease of doing business in the state. After this new scheme, the state aims to be counted in top 10 states of the nation for ease of doing business.

title: The state government of Himachal Pradesh has announced to build about 12000 houses under the Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana within the current financial year. The scheme has been started to provide financial assistance for houses to the poor belonging to general category in the state.
full_text:
The state government of Himachal Pradesh has announced to build about 12000 houses under the Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana within the current financial year. The scheme has been started to provide financial assistance for houses to the poor belonging to general category in the state.
Two more schemes named “Indira Awas Yojana” which was recently re-named to Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana Gramin and Atal Awas Yojana are already running in the state to provide homes to under-privileged families. The state government has set a target to build 1923 affordable homes under the Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana alone within the current financial year. The government has also increased the financial assistance amount under Atal & Indira Awas Yojana from Rs. 48,500 to Rs. 75,000.
Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana for BPL Families
The state government is providing a financial assistance of rupees 75,000 under Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana. Under this scheme the government would financially help 1923 BPL (Below Poverty Line) families belonging to the general category for construction of houses. A budget of rupees 25 crore has been earmarked by HP government for the implementation of Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

The state government has already built 13808 houses under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana Gramin with a budget of rupees 108.37 crore. 3363 houses were constructed under Rajiv Awas Yojana with a budget of Rupees 33 crore. Another 1515 houses are also being constructed in the current financial year.
13 Cities of the state have been selected under the first phase of Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana including Shimla, Solan, Nahan, Bilaspur, Hamirpur, Una, Mandi, Kullu, Dharamshala, Chamba, Parwanu, Baddi and Nalagarh. Remaining 41 cities will be selected under the second phase of the scheme.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

In order to ensure economic and social security for the poor families belonging to general category, the state government would be providing financial assistance to construct home under the Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana. The financial assistance under the scheme would be provided under National Livelihood Mission of Central Government.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Himachal Pradesh Government has approved a new scheme for teachers employed in Government schools. Named as Mukhya Mantri Shikshak Samman Yojana (MMSSY), the scheme is aimed at motivating the teachers for giving 100% results consistently. The scheme was approved by the state cabinet on 10th November 2016.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh Government has approved a new scheme for teachers employed in Government schools. Named as Mukhya Mantri Shikshak Samman Yojana (MMSSY), the scheme is aimed at motivating the teachers for giving 100% results consistently. The scheme was approved by the state cabinet on 10th November 2016.
Mukhya Mantri Shikshak Samman Yojana – Objective
The main objective of Mukhya Mantri Shikshak Samman Yojana is to motivate teachers to give better performance and improve the education level in the state. Scheme would be applicable to all trained graduate teachers (TGT), post graduate teachers (PGT), headmasters and principals.
The scheme has been launched by the state government after being concerned over the poor results of students and falling learning levels.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Facilities under Mukhya Mantri Shikshak Samman Yojana
Under the new scheme, if a teacher achieves 100% result for five years consistently, he/she will be given one year extension in service along with incentives.
The scheme is expected to bring in motivation in the teachers and improvement in overall learning levels in the state.

title: Government of Himachal Pradesh has launched a new scheme for development of roads to connect villages across the state. The government has announced the new scheme named as Mukhya Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana in the financial budget 2016-17.

Himachal Pradesh government has started a new HP Single Use Plastic Buy Back Scheme 2019. Under this scheme, the state govt. will buyback single-use, non-recyclable plastic waste with a minimum support price of Rs. 75 per kg. This scheme is started by CM Jai Ram Thakur at a function held on 2 October 2019 to mark the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi.
full_text:
Himachal Pradesh government has started a new HP Single Use Plastic Buy Back Scheme 2019. Under this scheme, the state govt. will buyback single-use, non-recyclable plastic waste with a minimum support price of Rs. 75 per kg. This scheme is started by CM Jai Ram Thakur at a function held on 2 October 2019 to mark the 150th birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi.
As per initial estimates, the total plastic which is likely to be collected will be about 75,000 kg. The budget required for plastic buy back is around Rs. 2.81 crore. The non-recyclable waste will include polythene bags and govt. will purchase this waste from rag-pickers, households and urban local bodies (ULBs).
Since 2 October 2009, there has been a complete ban on the use of polythene bags in Himachal Pradesh state. The HP single-use plastic buyback scheme got the cabinet approval on 16 September 2019.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Single Use Plastic Buy Back Scheme 2019
CM Jai Ram Thakur of Himachal Pradesh has launched HP Single Use Plastic Buy Back Scheme. At a function organized here to celebrate the birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, CM said that single use plastic (disposable) is not only an environment hazard but also a health threat for humans and animals. 
This scheme will encourage people to use environment-friendly bags instead of polythene. HP state govt. has already imposed ban on usage of plastic bags and cutlery made of plastic and thermocol. Jute bags are an alternative to plastic bags. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

There is a need to adopt Gandhiji’s humanistic message and ideology in life. This year, the state govt. celebrates 150th birth anniversary of Father of Nation as “Swachhata Hi Seva” campaign. On 2 October 2019, the state govt. also celebrates the day to perform “Shramdaan” to eradicate plastic waste.
Himachal Pradesh is the first state to tackle the threat of plastic and other non-biodegradable waste. The polythene waste collected through various awareness campaigns would be used as an alternative in road construction and as fuel in cement kilns.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Pradesh Government has announced a new housing scheme named as “Mukhya Mantri Awas Yojana” in the Budget 2016-17. The scheme has been launched to provide affordable housing for people belonging to the BPL (Below Poverty Line).

हिमाचल प्रदेश मुख्यमंत्री सेवा संकल्प हेल्पलाइन नंबर सुविधा की शुरुआत की गयी, अब आम आदमी अपनी समस्याओं को फोन के जरिये टोल फ्री नंबर 1100 पर कॉल करके मुख्यमंत्री तक पहुंचा पाएंगेHimachal Pradesh government has started a new Mukhyamantri Seva Sankalp Helpline Number 1100 for public grievance addressal in the state. On this Chief Minister Seva Sankalp Helpline No, people can easily place call from their mobile phones and tell their problems to CMO. On dialling 1100, the officials will properly respond & provide resolution of the problem. A follow up call would also be made from the call center to people to get their feedback.
full_text:
हिमाचल प्रदेश मुख्यमंत्री सेवा संकल्प हेल्पलाइन नंबर सुविधा की शुरुआत की गयी, अब आम आदमी अपनी समस्याओं को फोन के जरिये टोल फ्री नंबर 1100 पर कॉल करके मुख्यमंत्री तक पहुंचा पाएंगेHimachal Pradesh government has started a new Mukhyamantri Seva Sankalp Helpline Number 1100 for public grievance addressal in the state. On this Chief Minister Seva Sankalp Helpline No, people can easily place call from their mobile phones and tell their problems to CMO. On dialling 1100, the officials will properly respond & provide resolution of the problem. A follow up call would also be made from the call center to people to get their feedback. 
The state govt. of Himachal Pradesh has released a 4 digit toll free (Dial 1100) for CM Seva Sankalp Helpline Number. At one time, this newly launched helpline number would be able to attend specific number calls of people to address their difficulties. Previously, suggestions were invited for better name of Himachal CM Helpline at [email protected]
CM Jairam Thakur has made an official tweet on his official twitter handler and given this information about CM Seva Sankalp toll free number. This helpline number facility (suvidha) is now functional.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Mukhyamantri Seva Sankalp Helpline Number (1100)
Firstly, any person who is facing any difficulty in work related to any state department can call at 1100. This is a toll free Him Seva Helpline of the HP state govt. to contact CM office directly. On receiving the call at the call center setup by the Himachal Pradesh government, an official attending the call placed at Mukhyamantri Seva Sankalp Helpline number will note down the problem.
Then the official entry of problem would be feed inside the computer data. The problem would then be transferred to the concerned officials for taking action at the earliest. This action must be taken in a time bound manner so that the grievance could be resolved.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

After taking suitable action on the problem, complainant will get progress information at their handsets. CM Jairam Thakur will also review the functioning of CM Seva Sankalp Helpline No. every month. In the new call center, various officials will remain present to address grievances of people.

मेरा संकल्प जनता की प्रत्येक समस्या का समाधान करना है।
आज हमने हिमाचल में ‘‘मुख्यमंत्री सेवा संकल्प हेल्पलाइन’’ का शुभारंभ किया।
अब मेरे प्रदेशवासी हेल्पलाइन के टोल फ्री नंबर 1100 पर शिकायत दर्ज करवा सकेंगे।आपकी समस्या का समाधान त्वरित किया जाएगा।#मुख्यमंत्रीसेवासंकल्प pic.twitter.com/vb7Fauuvhz
— Jairam Thakur (@jairamthakurbjp) September 16, 2019
 
Need For CM Seva Sankalp Helpline Number in Himachal Pradesh
As all the people in Himachal Pradesh are not able to place their complaints online, so HP govt. has started CM Seva Sankalp Helpline Number. In this Mukhyamantri help toll free no., people can directly contact the CM Office. Currently, only the complaints send through e-mail & e-samadhaan are addressed. This is a major move of HP govt. as people who are illiterate or less efficient can now take benefits of this CM Seva Sankalp toll free number.
The main commitment is to ensure good governance where problems of all citizens are heard in an unbiased manner. In addition to this, citizens can send their suggestions for better functioning of elected govt. at new e-mail ID at [email protected]





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: कमजोर वर्गों के उपचार के लिए हिमाचल प्रदेश सरकार ने शुरू करी सहारा योजना, राज्य सरकार कैंसर, पारकिनसन, पैरालिसिस, मस्कुलर डिस्ट्रॉफी, थैलेसिमिया, हिमोफिलिया और रेनल फेलियर जैसी गंभीर बीमारियों से ग्रसित व्यक्तियों को प्रति माह 3000 रुपये की आर्थिक मदद देगी
full_text:
कमजोर वर्गों के उपचार के लिए हिमाचल प्रदेश सरकार ने शुरू करी सहारा योजना, राज्य सरकार कैंसर, पारकिनसन, पैरालिसिस, मस्कुलर डिस्ट्रॉफी, थैलेसिमिया, हिमोफिलिया और रेनल फेलियर जैसी गंभीर बीमारियों से ग्रसित व्यक्तियों को प्रति माह 3000 रुपये की आर्थिक मदद देगी

Table of Contents

Himachal Pradesh Sahara Yojana 2020 Offline ApplicationHP Sahara Yojana 2020 Eligibility CriteriaList of Documents Required to Apply Online for Sahara SchemeHighlights / Launch Details of HP Sahara Yojana
HP Sahara Yojana 2020 offline application has now been started by the Himachal Pradesh government on 11 September 2020. In this scheme, the state govt. will provide Rs. 3,000 per month to people suffering from severe diseases. HP Sahara Yojna will cover specific serious illnesses like paralysis, parkinson, cancer, muscular dystrophy, hemophilia, thalassemia and renal failure. The state govt. will provide financial assistance to patients belonging to economically weaker sections (EWS) category. 
This Sahara Scheme was announced in the Himachal Pradesh Budget 2019-20 to provide assistance to poor patients for medical treatment. Through HP Sahara Yojana, people would be able to meet the hardships faced during prolonged treatment of chronic diseases.
The state govt. of Himachal Pradesh had allocated Rs. 2,482 crore for healthcare scheme in Budget 2019-20 earlier. Now the scheme would continue benefiting people in the FY 2020-21 also.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Pradesh Sahara Yojana 2020 Offline Application
The important features and highlights of this Sahara Yojana in Himachal Pradesh are as follows:-
For medical treatment, govt. will provide Rs. 3,000 per month to EWS category patients.Serious diseases like paralysis, parkinson, cancer, muscular dystrophy, haemophilia, thalassemia are included. Moreover, chronic renal failure or any other disease which renders a person permanently incapacitated are also included.The main aims is to assist poor patients suffering from fatal diseases to migrate hardships faced during prolonged treatment.In the 1st phase, around 9,471 patients had been covered for which Rs. 14.40 crore were provided in FY 2019. Now for the FY 2020-21, this scheme will continue to benefit those patients along with new ones.CM Jai Ram Thakur had announced this Sahara Yojana earlier in 2nd HP Budget 2019-20. CMO Office has now officially started this scheme on 11 September 2020 for FY 2020-21 through a tweet on CMO Himachal (@CMOFFICEHP). 
A campaign would be launched to popularize the Sahara Yojna. The Accredited Social Health Activists (ASHA) and other health workers would identify beneficiaries and will assist them with prescribed formalities. The HP state govt. will also provide an incentive of Rs. 200 to ASHA workers to encourage participation. Offline application process will be carried out by these Anganwadi workers, Asha workers along with their helpers.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Sahara Yojana 2020 Eligibility Criteria
All the people who wants to become the HP Sahara Yojana beneficiaries must fulfill the conditions given below:-
Resident of Himachal Pradesh – All the applicants who wish to avail assistance must be a permanent resident of the Himachal Pradesh state.Economically Weaker Sections – All the candidates who belong to economically weaker section (EWS) category and comes below poverty line can avail assistance and treatment.Income Criteria – The annual income of the candidate from all sources, must not exceed Rs. 4 lakh p.a.Diagnosed Patients – Candidates who are on diagnosis must present a proof of their illness to get assistance.
In addition to these, there are around 4200 patients suffering from HIV / AIDS, the state govt. has extended their assistance to Rs. 1500 per month. Moreover, the Himachal Pradesh govt. will also start Mobile Diagnostic Van for identification and treatment of breast and survical cancer.
हिमाचल सरकार ने गंभीर बीमारियों से ग्रस्त व्यक्तियों को स्वास्थ्य सेवाओं के लाभ की आवश्यकताओं को पूर्ण करने हेतु ‘‘सहारा योजना’’ शुरू की है।योजना के अंतर्गत उक्त मरीजों को 3000 रुपए प्रतिमाह का वित्तीय लाभ देने का प्रावधान है। pic.twitter.com/Is8AI9GXeT— CMO HIMACHAL (@CMOFFICEHP) September 11, 2020 
List of Documents Required to Apply Online for Sahara Scheme
Here is the complete list of documents required to apply online for Sahara Yojana in Himachal Pradesh:-
Permanent Residence Certificate – In order to get their residence verified and confirmed, applicants can produce permanent residence certificate.Aadhaar Card or Identity Certificate – ID proof is a must document for any scheme, so applicants will have to prove their identity by showing some documents like Aadhaar card or any other documents.Treatment History – The treatment record of the applicant patient must be there to get assistance.Birth Certificate or 10th Marksheet – In order to prove date of birth of the applicant, either birth certificate or 10th marksheet needs to be produced.Income Certificate – To confirm that applicant belongs to economically weaker section (EWS) category, income certificate must be produced.Bank Details – The financial assistance amount of Rs. 3,000 per month would be transferred into the bank accounts of the beneficiaries through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) mode, so bank details are required.Passport Size Photograph – Recent 2 passport size photograph of the applicants would be required to fill application form.
Highlights / Launch Details of HP Sahara Yojana
Here are the highlights and launch details of the Himachal Pradesh Sahara Yojana 2020:- 
Official Name of SchemeHP Sahara YojanaLaunch Date11 September 2020Assistance AmountRs. 36,000 per annumLaunched byChief Minister Office (CMO) Himachal PradeshImplementation YearFY 2020-21Concerned DepartmentHealth & Family Welfare DepartmentMajor BeneficiariesPeople from Economically Weaker SectionsSalient Features of HP Sahara Yojana

title: हिमाचल प्रदेश मुख्यमंत्री हिम सेवा हेल्पलाइन नंबर सुविधा की रूपरेखा तैयार, अब आम आदमी अपनी समस्याओं को फोन के जरिये मुख्यमंत्री तक पहुंचा पाएंगे, जल्द ही जारी किया जाएगा टोल फ्री नंबरHimachal Pradesh government is going to start Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline Number in the state very soon. On this Chief Minister Him Seva Helpline No, people can place call from their mobile phones and tell their problems on which govt. officials will tell the proper solution. The state govt. will also place a follow up call to the people to ensure that their problem is addressed properly or not. This call center would be opened at crossing near parking in Shimla.
full_text:
हिमाचल प्रदेश मुख्यमंत्री हिम सेवा हेल्पलाइन नंबर सुविधा की रूपरेखा तैयार, अब आम आदमी अपनी समस्याओं को फोन के जरिये मुख्यमंत्री तक पहुंचा पाएंगे, जल्द ही जारी किया जाएगा टोल फ्री नंबरHimachal Pradesh government is going to start Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline Number in the state very soon. On this Chief Minister Him Seva Helpline No, people can place call from their mobile phones and tell their problems on which govt. officials will tell the proper solution. The state govt. will also place a follow up call to the people to ensure that their problem is addressed properly or not. This call center would be opened at crossing near parking in Shimla. 
The state govt. will release a 4 digit number for Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline Number in Himachal Pradesh. At one time, this helpline number would be able to attend 60 calls of people to address their difficulties. Suggestions are invited for better name of Himachal CM Helpline at [email protected] 
CM Jairam Thakur has made an official tweet and given this information about CM Him Seva helpline number. In this tweet, CM also mentioned that this helpline number facility (suvidha) would start in the next few days.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

HP Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline Number
At the call center setup by the Himachal Pradesh government, an official attending the call placed at Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline number will note down the problem. He will then feed it inside the computer and the problem would then be forwarded to the concerned official. That official will have to take time bound action on that problem and address that problem.
As soon as the proper action is taken on the problem, then the complainant would be given information regarding this. Chief Minister Jairam Thakur will review the functioning of CM Him Seva Helpline No. every month. CMO Himachal Pradesh has prepared a completed draft action plan for implementation of this toll free number.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

In the newly setup call center, dozens of officials will sit together to address problems of people. Moreover, the software in which the call attendant has to feed the problem is already prepared and is in final stage of testing.

देवभूमि हिमाचल की प्रगति एवं बेहतर सुशासन के लिए प्रदेश सरकार को ई-मेल के माध्यम से [email protected] पर अपने कीमती सुझाव अवश्य भेजें।#शिखरकीओरहिमाचल pic.twitter.com/VBAxpMGjj1
— Jairam Thakur (@jairamthakurbjp) May 29, 2019

Need For CM Him Seva Helpline Number
All the people are not able to place their complaints online, so the state govt. has taken this initiative to launch Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline Number in HP. Till date, people only have the option to send their complaints through e-mail, e-samadhaan to chief minister. But this toll free facility would enable people to directly talk to the CM regarding their problems. 
People who are illiterate or less efficient in making online complaints can now take the benefits of their Mukhyamantri Him Seva Helpline Number. The Chief Minister Office has asked citizens to give their suggestions for better functioning of the elected government. The state govt. has started a new e-mail ID [email protected] to invite suggestions from people. 
People can give your suggestions for better name of Himachal CM Helpline Number at [email protected]





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Himachal Pradesh government is inviting online enrollment forms for the Himachal Health Care Scheme (HIMCARE) at hpsbys.in. Now people can make him care online registration to apply online for himcare health scheme. The process for himcare health card registration and online apply has been started at the official website. People can now check the details of him care card yojna, make himcare health card download and check hospital list.
Himcare Health Scheme Registration process has begun at the official website of Himachal Pradesh Swasthya Bima Yojna Society. Under this himcare health scheme, the state govt. provides cashless treatment of Rs. 5 lakh p.a per familt to max. 5 members in a family. All the registered family members under the him care health card yojna will get treatment at pre-defined package rates in all empanelled hospitals. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

The last date for Himachal Health Care (HIMCARE) Fresh Registration and Renew Registration (For Expired Card) is 15 July 2020. All the common and serious ailments have been included under this scheme and it has helped the beneficiaries in cutting down their expenditure on health services. 
Himcare Health Card Registration Online 2020
Below is the complete process for online HIMCARE enrollment and to get him care health card:-


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});


Firstly visit the official website of Himachal Pradesh Swasthya Bima Yojna Society at hpsbys.in
At the homepage, click at the “ONLINE HIMCARE ENROLLMENT” link or directly click this link
The Online Enrollment Form under Himcare Health Scheme will appear as shown below:-
Himcare Scheme Online Enrollment Form Him Care Card
Here candidates can fill in their ration card number. Then candidates can click at the “Submit” button to complete the Himcare Health Card online registration process.
Upon clicking the submit button, if you are already registered then your details will appear as shown below:-
Him Care Policy Ration Card Link Status
People who are not registered can apply online for Himcare Scheme through ration card or can fill Him Care Card online application form (previous process) as shown below:-
Himcare Health Card Online Apply
Applicants can enter all the necessary details accurately and submit the completed application form to complete the registration process.

The Himcare beneficiaries can register themselves at www.hpsbys.in or through Lok Mitra Kendras. The required documents for uploading under this scheme are also available on the departmental website. All the beneficiaries will have to pay the premium (Him Care Card Fees) from Rs. 0 to Rs. 1000. The people of the HP state were unable to register due to lockdown, therefore to facilitate the families, the government has extended the dates. Families whose cards have expired on 15th June 2020 can also renew their cards till July 15.
Himcare Health Scheme Enrollment Status (Policy Status)
All the candidates can check the enrollment status of Himcare Health Scheme through the link given below:-
https://app.hpsbys.in/WebSite/viewenrollmentstatus.aspx
Here candidates can enter their reference number or ration card number and click at the “Search” button to check their HIMCARE enrollment status. All the people left out of the Ayushman Bharat Yojana can apply online for Himcare health card yojana in Himachal Pradesh.
Migrate Old Card to Him Care Card Yojna
In order to migrate old card to Him care card yojna candidates will have to click the link below:-
https://app.hpsbys.in/WebSite/PrintHimcareforOldEnrolled.aspx
Now people can just simply enter their URN number and click at “Search” button to migrate their old card to Himcare health card.
Himachal Health Care Yojana Himcare
Himcare Health Card Download – Get My Him Care Card
All the candidates can now download their Himcare health card by clicking the link below:-
https://app.hpsbys.in/WebSite/GetmyHimcareCard.aspx
Here candidates can enter their URN / Aadhaar / Ration card number and click at the “Search” button to get him care card. Even people can apply online to add family member details through the link – Add Family Member in Himcare
Him Care Card Apply Online for Renewal
HIMCARE card holder can only renew their applications. To apply online for Him Care Card Renewal, click the link below:-
https://app.hpsbys.in/WebSite/checkforrenew.aspx
After clicking the above mentioned link, people can just enter their URN / Himcare number and hit at “Search” button to apply online for Himcare health card renewal.
Himcare Health Card Hospital List 2020
All the candidates can now check the Himcare Health Card Hospital List online through the link:-

https://www.hpsbys.in/content/iuu
The page displaying the complete himcare hospital list will appear as follows:-
Himcare Health Card Hospital List

People can also check the hospitals through the direct link at https://app.hpsbys.in/WebSite/SearchHospital.aspx. Also perform the Advance hospital search through the link – https://www.hpsbys.in/advance-hospital-search 
Check Himcare Card Balance
Here is the direct link to check the Himcare Card balance which is given below:-
https://app.hpsbys.in/WebSite/CheckCardBalance.aspx
People can then enter the URN number and click at the “Search” button to check the Himcare Card balance.
Himcare Health Card Yojana References
— To get detailed knowledge of the premium amount & list of documents needed, click the link – About Himcare
— For more details, visit the official website at https://www.hpsbys.in/

title: Power for All– Jammu and Kashmir govt. has launched Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana (Saubhagya Scheme) across the state. Subsequently, this scheme will provide free electricity connections to all the poor citizens of the state. Central govt. has already launched this scheme in the country to provide electricity to around 4 crore rural households across the country till December 2018. Accordingly, Jammu & Kashmir state govt. decides to launch this scheme to provide electricity connections.
full_text:
Power for All– Jammu and Kashmir govt. has launched Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana (Saubhagya Scheme) across the state. Subsequently, this scheme will provide free electricity connections to all the poor citizens of the state. Central govt. has already launched this scheme in the country to provide electricity to around 4 crore rural households across the country till December 2018. Accordingly, Jammu & Kashmir state govt. decides to launch this scheme to provide electricity connections.
The state govt. will provide these electricity connections at just Rs 500 which are to be paid in 10 installments in bill. This scheme is basically to empower poor and economically weaker sections of the society. Henceforth, all the rural households whose names appears in the SECC-2011 data can avail these connections.
Details of J&K Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana
The highlights and important features of this scheme are as follows:-



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});


Deputy CM of Jammu and Kashmir has launched this scheme.
Subsequently, the state govt. will provide electricity to the poor people as identified in the Socio Economic and Caste Census data of 2011.
Accordingly, govt. will provide connections at Rs 500 which poor people can pay in 10 installments in their upcoming bills.
Henceforth to avail the benefits of this scheme, applicants will have to make on the spot registration. For this reason, applicants will have to furnish an identity proof.
This Saubhagya initiative of the Modi’s Central govt is for the empowerment of the unprivileged sections of the society.
Subsequently, the state govt. will take every possible measures to ensure that the beneficiaries are identified and are receiving the benefits in a transparent manner.
Furthermore, govt. will constitute several teams in consultation with the electric line departments. This is to ensure that the genuine and deserving ones will receive the electricity connections.

Jammu and Kashmir state govt. is taking every possible measure to strengthen the power sector. The state govt. will adopt several other mechanisms to improve the electric infrastructure in the state. Furthermore, J&K gov. will emphasize on increasing the power generation and transmission capacity of the state to realize the dream of “Power for All”.
References
— To know more details about the Pradhan Mantri Sahaj Har ghar Bijli Yojana, please see the Saubhagya Web Portal using the link given below:-
Saubhagya Dashboard

title: Jammu and Kashmir government has announced the launch of All Terrain Bike (ATB) programme after the ‘Scooty’ scheme for girls. The scheme is for meritorious boys of lower economic strata. Chief Minister Mehbooba Mufti, announced the launch of All Terrain Bike (ATB) scheme for meritorious boys on the pattern of Scooty Scheme for the girl students.
full_text:
Jammu and Kashmir government has announced the launch of All Terrain Bike (ATB) programme after the ‘Scooty’ scheme for girls. The scheme is for meritorious boys of lower economic strata. Chief Minister Mehbooba Mufti, announced the launch of All Terrain Bike (ATB) scheme for meritorious boys on the pattern of Scooty Scheme for the girl students.
The ATB scheme was announced during an event held at Women’s Degree College in Baramulla where Chief Minister handed over keys of subsidized Scooties to 150 girl students. Under the All Terrain Bike scheme, the state government would provide high-end cycles (All Terrain Bikes) to boys students of 10th standard in a government school.
The 90% of the cost of the motor cycle would be funded by the state government while only 10% would be paid by the students. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Eligibility of the ATB scheme

The boy should be a student of 10th standard belonging to lower economic background.
The student who has to cover a distance of more than 2 kms from his home to school will be eligible for scheme.
The student shall secure above 65 per cent in his 10th exams.
The student should give in writing that he shall continue to pursue his education.
The all terrain bike scheme would enable the students to not only have independence of mobility but at the same time promote a healthy way of commuting among them. The cycles distributed under this scheme will not be allowed to be resold, and any violation will result in forfeiting of the Cycle (ATB).


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

 




(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: UJALA, a central government scheme for distribution of LED bulbs at subsidized rates has been launched in the state of Jammu & Kashmir. The scheme launch was marked by Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Mehbooba Mufti on Sunday by distributing the LED bulbs among the people.

Mufti Mohammad Sayeed Food Entitlement Scheme (MMSFES) is a food and supplement security scheme launched by Chief Minister, Mehbooba Mufti. The scheme has been launched to ensure the safety of food under targeted public distribution system. The scheme is named after the former Chief Minister Mufti Mohammad Sayeed.

Jammu and Kashmir Government is all set to launch a new scheme named “Mufti Mohammad Sayeed Food Entitlement (MMSFE)” from July 2016. Under the scheme, additional 5 kg ration to per soul per month will be provided in addition to his entitlement under NFSA.

Table of Contents

PM Awas Yojana Online Application Forms 2020PMAY EligibilityTake Printout of Online Application Form of PMAYPMAY Online Application Edit/Change/Update
pmaymis.gov.in – PMAY Online Application Forms 2020 | PMAY Online Registration CSC | Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana Online Application Form 2020
Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana 2020 online application forms are being accepted through the official website of PM Awas Yojana at pmaymis.gov.in. The online application process for Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana is very simple and here we will guide you on how to fill online application forms for Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana 2019-2020 through pmaymis.gov.in.
The online registration process for PM Awas Yojana is very simple, you just need to make sure that you are entering the correct information. If you are eligible to apply for PMAY, you can follow the below step by step PMAY online application procedure along with screenshots.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

LATEST UPDATE: Online applications for the PM Awas Yojana have been started again after the general elections 2019. Below is the complete procedure to apply online for PMAY-U.
The central government has recently extended the timeline to avail the interest subsidy on home loans under CLSS component of Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Urban by 15 Months. However the PMAY Last Date has been extended for the MIG applicants only.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

PM Awas Yojana Online Application Forms 2020
Below is the complete step by step procedure to apply online for Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Urban through the official website.
STEP 1: Open the official website of PMAY at pmaymis.gov.in and select one of the two options of Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana application from “Citizen Assessment” menu, as given in the below screenshot.
PMAY HFA Urban Online Registration
You have to select one of the two links as per the following criteria
– If you are currently living in slum area, then select “For Slum Dwellers” otherwise select “Benefits under other 3 Components” from the drop down menu.
OR You can directly click the following links to apply online for PMAY
For Slum Dwellers: https://pmaymis.gov.in/Open/Check_Aadhar_Existence.aspx?comp=a
For benefits under other 3 Components: https://pmaymis.gov.in/Open/Check_Aadhar_Existence.aspx?comp=b
STEP 2: On the next page as seen below, you will have to enter your Aadhar number or Virtual ID and Name as per Aadhar Card and click the “Check” button.
PMAY Urban Apply Online Aadhaar Virtual ID Name
STEP 3: If your Aadhar number is correct, a new page will open which will look like the below image. If your Aadhar number is incorrect, try again by entering your correct Aadhar number. If you do not have Aadhar number, you will not be able to apply for PMAY.
PMAY Online Application Form | Source: pmaymis.gov.in
STEP 4: Fill the details correctly including your personal details, contact details, current residential address, Aadhar Number, Bank Account details and income details in the application form.
STEP 5: Click the checkbox which says “I am aware of….” and then click the “Save” Button at the end of application form.
PMAY Online Application Form Submit | Source: pmaymis.gov.in
STEP 6: Once you click “Save”, you will see a new screen where a system generated application number will be given to you, you can either print this directly if a printer is attached with your computer or save it for your future reference.
Your application is now complete. You can track status of PMAY application on the same website at pmaymis.gov.in.
PMAY Eligibility
Before applying for PM Awas Yojana online, please make sure that
– You are eligible to apply for the scheme (Check your name in the PMAY beneficiary list).
– You have your Aadhar Number with you, Aadhar is mandatory for PMAY online application.
– Your computer is connected to a reliable internet connection.
– You have the details of your saving bank account with you.
– You have the actual details of your household income.
Eligibility PM Awas Yojana
Take Printout of Online Application Form of PMAY
You can take a printout of the PMAY online application form filled by you by entering your name, father name & ID type or just the application number. Click the link below to take print out of PMAY application form.
https://pmaymis.gov.in/Open/Print_Application_By_applicationNo.aspx
The PMAY HFA Urban print assessment form page by application number will appear as shown below:-
PMAY Urban Online Application Form Print Name Mobile No.
People can also take printout of their PMAY Urban application form online through assessment ID which will appear as below:-
PMAY Urban Online Application Form Print Assessment ID
PMAY Online Application Edit/Change/Update
After submission of online application form on pmaymis.gov.in, you can also edit the details just by entering your application number and Aadhar number. The facility has been provided to the applicants in case they entered any detail incorrectly or wish to change their contact details.
PMAY Urban Apply Online Form Edit Update
To change or update the information of your PMAY application, please visit this link.
https://pmaymis.gov.in/Open/Format_A_B_Edit.aspx
Online applications for Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana are also being invited through Common Service Centers, to know the procedure to apply through CSC, please follow the links below
IN ENGLISH: Apply Online for Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban) through CSC 
IN HINDI: प्रधान मंत्री आवास योजना के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन कैसे करें – पूरी जानकारी
NOTE: These applications for PMAY are being invited by Ministry of Housing and Urban Poverty Alleviation for assessment purpose, the final approval to the application would be given by State Government / Urban Local Body.
See PM Awas Yojana List of Beneficiaries 2020

title: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Gramin (PMAY-G) has finally been launched by the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi in Agra on 20th November 2016. Under the PM Awas Yojana Gramin affordable housing scheme, central government aims to develop 3 Crore homes by the year 2022 in rural areas for poor families including BPL.
full_text:
Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Gramin (PMAY-G) has finally been launched by the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi in Agra on 20th November 2016. Under the PM Awas Yojana Gramin affordable housing scheme, central government aims to develop 3 Crore homes by the year 2022 in rural areas for poor families including BPL.
PMAY-G is the revamped version of Indira Awas Yojana which was renamed earlier this year with some pro-poor changes in the scheme. Housing units under the PMAY-G scheme are already being offered to the beneficiaries in rural areas across the country. Pradhan Mantri Narendra Modi also handed over the allotment letters to the beneficiaries during the launch event.
The minimum area of home under the new scheme has been increased to 25 Square meter (267 Square foot) from 20 Sq.Mt. in earlier scheme.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Government has also released the scheme logo and a video

http://iay.nic.in/netiay/Video/PMAYGLaunch.mp4
The objective of the scheme is to provide homes to every Indian by the year 2022. Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Gramin will be implemented across the country except Delhi and Chandigarh. The immediate target of PMAY-G is to construct 1 Crore affordable homes in rural areas by the year 2018-19.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Financial Assistance Under PMAY-G
The central government would be providing a financial assistance of Rs. Rs. 120,000 in plain areas and Rs. 130,000 in eastern, hilly and IAP areas to the beneficiaries. Along with this, an additional Rs. 12000 will also be provided to build toilet to each beneficiary under the Swachch Bharat Mission. The beneficiaries will also be provided daily wages of up to 90-95 days (Rs. 18000) through MGNREGA.
Hence, the total financial assistance amount will be 1 Lakh 50 thousand for plain areas and 1 Lakh 60 thousand for eastern, hilly and IAP areas. Interested beneficiaries can also avail a loan of upto Rs. 70000 from any of the nationalized banks for the construction of home. 
Selection of beneficiaries under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Gramin will be done on the basis of SECC-2011 data. The government has also launched AwaasApp for beneficiaries to know the status of their application, funding or share the progress of construction.
To know more about the PMAY-G, please visit the following links
IN ENGLISH: https://sarkariyojana.com/pradhan-mantri-awas-yojana-gramin/
IN HINDI: Pradhan Mantri Gramin Awas Yojana in Hindi
OR visit the official website at http://iay.nic.in
Video & Image Source and Credits: http://iay.nic.in

In the J&K state, voting for 7 Loksabha seats was held in 4 phases namely Phase 1 (voting on 11th April 2019), Phase 2 (voting on 18th April 2019), Phase 4 (voting on 29th April 2019), Phase 5 (voting on 6th May 2019). Chief Electoral Officer has published JK CEO Voter List 2020 where people can perform name search in the New PDF Electoral Roll and download Voter ID Card online at ceojk.nic.in or ceojammukashmir.nic.in
full_text:
जम्मू और कश्मीर वोटर लिस्ट 2020 (PDF) अब सीईओ की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट ceojk.nic.in पर उपलब्ध है, नयी मतदाता सूची में अपना नाम अपनी जानकारी या EPIC नंबर के आधार पर खोजें और वोटर ID कार्ड डाउनलोड करेंElection Commission of India (ECI) had announced Lok Sabha Election Dates for voting across the country. In the J&K state, voting for 7 Loksabha seats was held in 4 phases namely Phase 1 (voting on 11th April 2019), Phase 2 (voting on 18th April 2019), Phase 4 (voting on 29th April 2019), Phase 5 (voting on 6th May 2019). Chief Electoral Officer has published JK CEO Voter List 2020 where people can perform name search in the New PDF Electoral Roll and download Voter ID Card online at ceojk.nic.in or ceojammukashmir.nic.in
All the citizens can check their name in the district wise JKCEO Voter List 2020 with Photo and download Voter ID Card. The updated JK CEO Electoral Rolls with Photo are available in the PDF format where people can find their name in the CEO JK Voters List 2020 and can Download Voter ID Card before casting their vote. In case the name of the candidate does not appears in the Jammu & Kashmir voters list, then they can apply online for voter card. 
The entire PDF file of the electoral roll (JK CEO Voter List 2020) is now available. Here citizens can perform manual searching in the J&K Voter List 2020. Moreover, people can adopt a hassle free process and check their names online.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Jammu and Kashmir Voter List 2020 (JK CEO Electoral Rolls) Download @ ceojk.nic.in
Below is the complete procedure to download JKCEO Voter List 2020 (PDF Electoral Rolls):-

Firstly visit the official JK CEO website at ceojk.nic.in
At the homepage, click at the “Download Electoral Rolls” tab present on the right side of the page:-
JK CEO Voter List 2020
The direct link to open the voters list of J&K is Download JK CEO Voter List. After clicking this link, people can download Assembly Constituency wise report or Polling Station wise report as shown below:-
JKCEO Voter List 2020 Download
On this page, candidates can click at the “PS Wise Report” option, select the language and then click the “Show” button to open the Polling Station Wise Report as shown below:-
ceojk.nic.in Voter List PS Wise
Here candidates can select the district, assembly constituency, polling station and then click at “Get Report” button. Finally, click at the ‘File link’ to download the PDF of CEO Voter List 2020 Jammu and Kashmir as shown below:-
Voter List 2020 Jammu and Kashmir

Candidates can find their name manually in the downloaded CEO Voters List of Jammu & Kashmir. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Find Name in JKCEO Voter List – JK Voter ID Card Online
To check the name in the JKCEO Voter List, visit the official website at ceojammukashmir.nic.in. At the homepage, click at the “Search Your Name” tab to open the name find page as shown below:-
Voter ID Card Online JK
Candidates can search their name in the CEO Voter List 2020 with Photo and download the JK Voter ID Card Online.If the name of the person does not appears in the JKCEO Voters List, then citizens can apply online for voter card Jammu & Kashmir. In case of any query, candidates can call on the helpline number 1950. 
For more details, visit the official website http://ceojammukashmir.nic.in/ or http://ceojk.nic.in/

title: Jammu and Kashmir govt. has announced to launch J&K Government Scholarship Scheme for Differently Abled Students. As per the announcement on the International Day of Disabled Persons, financial assistance of Rs 1 lakh each would be awarded annually to a meritorious specially abled boy and girl student.
full_text:
Jammu and Kashmir govt. has announced to launch J&K Government Scholarship Scheme for Differently Abled Students. As per the announcement on the International Day of Disabled Persons, financial assistance of Rs 1 lakh each would be awarded annually to a meritorious specially abled boy and girl student. 
J&K Govt Scholarship Scheme for Specially Abled Students is a social welfare scheme for handicapped persons. This scheme is a part of the ongoing efforts to create suitable infrastructure and institutions to facilitate the adjustment of disabled students in the society.
This scheme will ensure handicapped students to lead a life of dignity and raise their status of living in the society.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

J&K Govt Scholarship Scheme for Differently Abled Students
This scheme aims to provide best possible facilities to ensure the holistic development of persons with special needs. The main objectives of J&K government scholarship scheme for specially-abled students are as follows:-

To provide assistance and encouragement to the students with special needs.
Enabling handicapped students to acquire technical, professional or vocational training.
To enable them to get a life of dignity and to make them useful and contributory members in the society.

Suitable infrastructure and institutions would be provided in order to facilitate the adjustment of specially abled students in society.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

International Day of Disabled Persons
The International Day of Disabled Persons is observed every year on 3rd December. Governor has appreciated the cultural performances which was presented by these children and has also announced cash awards to the performers and anchor of the program.
J&K governor has also announced a five-day orientation programme for 30 children with special needs in Bangalore and Karnataka. Moreover, those children who have participated in the function will also get a chance to visit to Mansar lake. Governor has also highlighted the need to donate liberally for disabled people to help them to cope up with routine life and showcasing their talent.

title: Jammu & Kashmir govt. has launched Ayushman Bharat – PM Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY) on 1 December 2018. PMJAY health insurance scheme in J&K is going to benefit around 31 lakh residents in the state. To mark the official launch of the scheme, governor has distributed golden cards among 10 beneficiaries to avail the annual health coverage facility.
full_text:
Jammu & Kashmir govt. has launched Ayushman Bharat – PM Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY) on 1 December 2018. PMJAY health insurance scheme in J&K is going to benefit around 31 lakh residents in the state. To mark the official launch of the scheme, governor has distributed golden cards among 10 beneficiaries to avail the annual health coverage facility. 
Ayushman Bharat Yojana or the Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana will provide cashless and paperless health insurance facilities to the poor and vulnerable families. People can avail these treatment facilities in all govt. and empanelled private secondary and tertiary care hospitals of the country.
AB-PMJAY scheme (Modicare) is the world’s largest healthcare scheme to provide portable coverage of Rs. 5 lakh per entitled family annually. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Ayushman Bharat – PM Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY) in J&K
In this national health protection scheme (NHPS), around 31 lakh citizens will be able to get free treatment upto Rs. 5 lakh. Under J&K Ayushman Bharat Yojana, hospitals cannot deny treatment to any of the resident on the basis of their caste, colour, creed, religion. Moreover, there is no limit on the age and income to avail cashless and paperless treatment from any public and private empanelled hospitals across the country.
J&k Governor has expressed its gratitude to PM Narendra Modi on launching this noble scheme for the benefits of poor. Central govt. has launched various people friendly welfare schemes and AB-PMJAY is the best among all in which each entitled beneficiary can avail Rs. 5 lakh annually for medical treatment.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

J&K has secured 1st position in the country on account of high reduction in the infant mortality rate (IMR) in a single year. This also accounts to provide better healthcare facilities to the rural population of the state. AB-PMJAY is a flagship scheme of the Modi govt. launched on 23 September 2018 to improve and strengthen healthcare at all levels. 

Glimpses Launching of Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana-Ayushman Bharat in Jammu and Kashmir. pic.twitter.com/9N3QLYTNun
— BJP Jammu & Kashmir (@BJP4JnK) December 1, 2018

Under this scheme, govt. is also going to create around 1.5 lakh new Health and Wellness Centers across the country. The state health agency has also empanelled 144 government and private hospitals till date. The state govt. has also started a vigorous drive for the registration of beneficiaries for the golden cards.

title: Governor’s administration in Jammu and Kashmir has rolled out Group Mediclaim Health Insurance Scheme for employees, pensioners and accredited journalists in the state. Under this scheme, the state govt. will provide health insurance coverage of Rs. 6 lakh per employee or pensioner per annum. Even the 5 dependent family members of the beneficiaries are also included for insurance coverage on floater basis.
full_text:
Governor’s administration in Jammu and Kashmir has rolled out Group Mediclaim Health Insurance Scheme for employees, pensioners and accredited journalists in the state. Under this scheme, the state govt. will provide health insurance coverage of Rs. 6 lakh per employee or pensioner per annum. Even the 5 dependent family members of the beneficiaries are also included for insurance coverage on floater basis. 
J&K Group Mediclaim Health Insurance Scheme is compulsory for all government employees including employees of PSUs, autonomous bodies and universities. However, this scheme is optional for pensioners, AIS officers, contractual employees, daily wage workers, contingent paid workers and accredited journalists.
The state administration wants to improve the overall health insurance coverage in the state to realize its vision of “Health For All”.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

J&K Group Mediclaim Health Insurance Scheme
The important features and highlights of J&K group mediclaim health insurance scheme are as follows:-

This scheme will provide Rs. 6 lakh p.a insurance coverage per employee or pensioner. Along with the enrolled employee, pensioner or journalists, their 5 dependent family members will also be included in the scheme on a floater basis.
Group Mediclaim policy will come into effect from 1 October 2018 for a period of 1 year. This scheme can be extended annually for the next 3 years on the basis of satisfactory performance of the insurer.
This policy has been tied up with Reliance General Insurance company. Employees will have to pay an annual premium of Rs. 8,777 and pensioners will have to pay an annual premium of Rs. 22,229.
Shri Mata Vaishno Devi Shrine Board, Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University, Shri Amarnathji Shrine Board and the accredited journalists of the state shall be also covered under J&K group insurance scheme.

The annual premium would be deducted in four quarterly installments of Rs. 1,295 each. These installments would be deducted on 1 October, 15 January, 15 April and the last installment on 1 July.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

As per the official reports, it is important to note here that the insurance company will also create a corporate buffer of Rs. 10 crore as a part of this mediclaim policy. This buffer will help in meeting the expenditure incurred on the identified illness over and above the insurance coverage amount of Rs six lakh.

title: Finance Ministry, Jammu & Kashmir has launched CM’s Business Interest Relief Scheme for industries and businesses. Subsequently, J&K govt. will provide one-third (1/3) of the total interest payment pending for all the RBI approved restructured accounts. Accordingly, this scheme is launched for the upcoming 2 years i.e from January 2018 – January 2020. This scheme will facilitate “Ease of Doing business in J&K”.
full_text:
Finance Ministry, Jammu & Kashmir has launched CM’s Business Interest Relief Scheme for industries and businesses. Subsequently, J&K govt. will provide one-third (1/3) of the total interest payment pending for all the RBI approved restructured accounts. Accordingly, this scheme is launched for the upcoming 2 years i.e from January 2018 – January 2020. This scheme will facilitate “Ease of Doing business in J&K”. 
Under this scheme, borrowers will have to pay two-third (2/3) amount of their monthly installment and state govt. will pay the rest amount. The state govt. announces this scheme in the financial budget of Jammu and Kashmir for the year 2018-19.
J&K govt. also ensures that it will not encourage the people to not pay their loans. While announcing the J&K Budget 2018-19, the state govt. has also announced the Assured Career Progression Scheme. This career progression scheme will provide benefits to all Gazetted Cadres of all engineering departments. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

CM’s Business Interest Relief Scheme – Details
The important features and highlights of this scheme are as follows:-

Under this scheme, the state govt. will pay one third while borrowers have to pay two-third of the monthly installment.
J&K govt. will provide this amount from CM’s Relief Fund and PM Interest Subvention Scheme.
This scheme is applicable for 2 calendar years i.e from Jan 2018 to Jan 2020.
Accordingly, this scheme will benefit several industries, trade bodies and business fraternity and will also give them fiscal space.
Moreover, various banks will also get benefited from this scheme as this scheme will help banks in their Non Performing Assets (NPA) build up.
Banks can avail these benefits only after a percentage point reduction in the average interest rate on the restructured folder.

The state govt. has launched this scheme in order to provide huge support to the borrowers. In addition to this, this scheme will help in flourishing trade and business activities across the state. Furthermore, J&K govt. will not inadvertently encourages the culture of reneging on the loan commitments.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Jammu & Kashmir Government is going to launch Muhafiz (Guardian) Scheme for the workers in the unorganized sector. Subsequently, this scheme will provide social-economic security to these workers. Under this Muhafiz (Guardian), govt. will cover approx. 3 lakh workers who are registered with “J&K Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (JKBOCWWB)”. These workers will get an accidental, life and disability insurance coverage.
full_text:
Jammu & Kashmir Government is going to launch Muhafiz (Guardian) Scheme for the workers in the unorganized sector. Subsequently, this scheme will provide social-economic security to these workers. Under this Muhafiz (Guardian), govt. will cover approx. 3 lakh workers who are registered with “J&K Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (JKBOCWWB)”. These workers will get an accidental, life and disability insurance coverage.
J&K govt. will launch this scheme on 8 January 2018. The children of these workers will also receive educational scholarships. Moreover, govt. will also extend micro credit facilities for these workers. Accordingly, the workers in the unorganized sector will have to make registration through online or other modes.
Initially, govt. will spend Rs. 5 crore as premium amount for these workers. This scheme will benefit the labourers especially belonging to the rural areas.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Details of Muhafiz (Guardian) Scheme
The important features and highlights of this scheme are as follows:-

Under Guardian Scheme, the workers who are registered with JKBOCWWB will get socio-economic security and an insurance coverage.
Initially, the credit facility limit will remain Rs. 10,000 along with a counter guarantee.
For this reason, JKBOCWWB will deposit Rs. 30 crore in the J&K Bank.
Moreover, govt. will also provide educational scholarships for the children of labourers.
This scheme will benefit around 3 lakh workers of unorganized sector especially from rural areas.
Furthermore, JKBOCWWB has also provided financial assistance of Rs. 275 crore for education, marriage, chronic diseases etc. in the previous 3 years to such workers.

Govt. is going to start this scheme because unorganized sector consists of the wage paid labourers. Subsequently, they have seasonal nature of employment and also their enterprises have scattered locations. Accordingly, workers have low income, unstable jobs, lack of protection from various legislations or trade unions. So J&K govt. is going to launch this scheme.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

J&K Govt. will raise the funds for socio-economic welfare of the workers through cess levied under the Building and Other Construction Workers (RE&CS) Cess Act. Moreover, this scheme will provide social security to the workers and their children.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Jammu and Kashmir bank has launched J&K Bank Sahafat Finance Scheme for journalists in the state of J&K. Subsequently, this special finance scheme will provide easy loan to the journalists. Accordingly, all the journalists can purchase several necessary things like cameras, laptops, books etc. J&K Bank has launched this scheme in order to provide financial assistance to the journalists which will strengthen the democracy.
full_text:
Jammu and Kashmir bank has launched J&K Bank Sahafat Finance Scheme for journalists in the state of J&K. Subsequently, this special finance scheme will provide easy loan to the journalists. Accordingly, all the journalists can purchase several necessary things like cameras, laptops, books etc. J&K Bank has launched this scheme in order to provide financial assistance to the journalists which will strengthen the democracy.
This provision of giving easy loans to the media persons will result in people adopting for journalism as a full time profession. In addition to this, this scheme will also recognize media as a viable sector.
J&K bank launches this scheme keeping in mind the hard work of the journalists who even risk their life for covering any news. This scheme will benefit them to a great extent.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

J&K Bank Sahafat Finance Scheme for Journalists
The important features and highlights of this scheme are as follows:-

J&K bank CEO and Chairman launches this scheme for journalists on 14 December 2017.
Under this scheme, journalists can get easy loans from the bank.
Subsequently, the minimum loan amount is Rs 50,000 and maximum loan amount is Rs 3,00,000.
Accordingly, journalists can repay the maximum credit of Rs 3 lakhs in 60 EMIs.
J&K Bank will provide this financial assistance as a term loan for buying cameras, laptops, tablets, books etc.
Moreover, there is a cash credit facility for them to meet their basic routine requirements.
Along with the Minimum Interest Rate, journalists will also get an insurance cover of Rs 4 Lakhs. For this,
they will have to pay Rs 342 as an annual premium.

J&K Bank Sahafat Finance Scheme is for providing easy access to the finance to meet their basic needs on urgent basis. Moreover, this scheme will enable the media persons to harness their talent and increase their returns to make them financial comfortable.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});






(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: झारखण्ड सरकार अब सारे प्रधानमंत्री उज्ज्वला योजना के लाभार्थियों को देगी मुफ्त एलपीजी गैस सिलिंडर रिफिल की सुविधा, इस सुविधा का लाभ 23 अगस्त 2019 से उठा सकेंगे, सरकार 12 लाख नए गैस कनेक्शन भी बांटेगीJharkhand govt. is going to start the process of Free LPG Cylinders Refill to beneficiaries of Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY). The state govt. will also start distribution of 12 lakh new LPG connections from 23 August 2019. People would be able to get free refill of their gas cylinders received under the flagship PMUY Scheme. PM Ujjwala Yojana is a flagship scheme of the central govt. to get rid of unclean cooking fuels.
full_text:
झारखण्ड सरकार अब सारे प्रधानमंत्री उज्ज्वला योजना के लाभार्थियों को देगी मुफ्त एलपीजी गैस सिलिंडर रिफिल की सुविधा, इस सुविधा का लाभ 23 अगस्त 2019 से उठा सकेंगे, सरकार 12 लाख नए गैस कनेक्शन भी बांटेगीJharkhand govt. is going to start the process of Free LPG Cylinders Refill to beneficiaries of Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY). The state govt. will also start distribution of 12 lakh new LPG connections from 23 August 2019. People would be able to get free refill of their gas cylinders received under the flagship PMUY Scheme. PM Ujjwala Yojana is a flagship scheme of the central govt. to get rid of unclean cooking fuels. 
Various non-communicable diseases such as heart disease, stroke, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and lung cancer are also prevented through this PMUY scheme. The state govt. has already provided LPG connections to BPL households to ensure universal coverage of cooking gas in the country. Moreover, PMUY Scheme has empowered women and even protects their health. 
So, to ensure that people continue to use LPG gas cylinders given under PMUY scheme, govt. will now provide free LPG gas cylinder refills.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Jharkhand Free LPG Cylinders Refill to PMUY Beneficiaries
All the beneficiaries of the flagship Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY) scheme in Jharkhand can now avail a free refill of their LPG cylinders. The state govt. of Jharkhand claims that this is a first-of-its-kind initiative in the country. Jharkhand govt. will start process of refill of cylinders along with distribution of 12 lakh new LPG gas connections.
The process of Jhakhand Free LPG Cylinders Refill to PMUY beneficiaries will start from 23 August 2019 across the state. Jharkhand is the only state in India where beneficiaries of PMUY scheme are given free ovens and filled cylinders during distribution of LPG gas connections. Now, people can refill their cylinders for free.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Since the launch of PMUY scheme in Jharkhand in 2016, around 31 lakh free LPG gas connections have already been distributed in the Jharkhand state.
The PMUY scheme aims to replace the hazardous cooking fuels used in rural India with clean and efficient LPG fuel. All the families living below poverty line (BPL) are the beneficiaries of PM Ujjwala Yojana. For more details, visit the official website at https://pmuy.gov.in/

title: Jharkhand cabinet decided to provide Rs. 1 lakh assistance to students of scheduled caste (SC) and scheduled tribes (ST) on clearing civil service preliminary exam conducted by union public service commission (UPSC). This financial assistance under Jharkhand SC / ST Civil Seva Protsahan Yojana will enable “Mahadalit” students to prepare for the mains of civil service examination conducted by UPSC.
full_text:
Jharkhand cabinet decided to provide Rs. 1 lakh assistance to students of scheduled caste (SC) and scheduled tribes (ST) on clearing civil service preliminary exam conducted by union public service commission (UPSC). This financial assistance under Jharkhand SC / ST Civil Seva Protsahan Yojana will enable “Mahadalit” students to prepare for the mains of civil service examination conducted by UPSC. 
Jharkhand SC / ST Civil Seva Protsahan Yojana will help the students from economically weaker sections to focus on their education without worrying about expenses. The state govt. is going to make payment of this amount / grant in a single installment and this money will get transferred directly into the bank accounts of students.
This scheme to provide assistance to SC / ST students has been launched by the Jharkhand govt. and will remain in effect from 1 August 2018.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Jharkhand SC / ST Civil Seva Protsahan Yojana
The scheme to encourage students from SC /ST category has been launched on 5th November 2018 in a cabinet meeting chaired by CM Raghubar Das. Now, all the SC / ST students who have cleared UPSC civil services preliminary (PT) exam will get an assistance of Rs. 1 lakh to prepare for the civil services mains examination under SC / ST Civil Seva Protsahan Yojana in Jharkhand.
Only such SC / ST students who have passed their intermediate (class 12th) and graduation from the state. This assistance can only be availed for a single time and the annual family income of the students from all sources must not exceed Rs. 2.5 lakh.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Even those candidates who are already taking benefits of coaching from either the state govt. or central govt. are also not eligible.

SC/ST छात्र-छात्राओं को संघ लोक सेवा आयोग द्वारा आयोजित सिविल सेवा परीक्षा की प्रारंभिक परीक्षा में उत्तीर्ण होने पर मुख्य परीक्षा / साक्षात्कार की तैयारी हेतु एक लाख रुपये की आर्थिक सहायता प्रदान की जायेगी। #NewJharkhand
— Raghubar Das (@dasraghubar) November 5, 2018


SC/ST students will not have to face financial constraints for further studies after passing UPSC prelims. #NewJharkhand pic.twitter.com/m5KP4wR46F
— Raghubar Das (@dasraghubar) November 6, 2018

Generally students have to move away from their homes to avail better study facilities in order to carry on their preparation for the civil services examination. So, all the bright candidates who have already cracked PT (preliminary test) of UPSC civil services exam will not have to think about expenses rather they must focus on the preparation for their Mains examination.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Jharkhand govt. has decided to launch a new Free Mobile Phone Scheme to provide smartphones to 28 lakh farmers as Diwali gift. This scheme will enable farmers to get connected to the e-NAM portal and directly sell their produce. This free smartphone scheme in Jharkhand will realize the PM’s vision of Digital India.
full_text:
Jharkhand govt. has decided to launch a new Free Mobile Phone Scheme to provide smartphones to 28 lakh farmers as Diwali gift. This scheme will enable farmers to get connected to the e-NAM portal and directly sell their produce. This free smartphone scheme in Jharkhand will realize the PM’s vision of Digital India.
CM said that the farmers must accept invitation of the state govt. and must become the brand ambassador of Agriculture and Food Summit going to organized on 29 & 30th November 2018. The primary objective of this summit is the overall development of farmers and as a whole of the agricultural sector.
These smartphones will enable transfer of technology within the farmers and the state govt. will implement this free mobile phone scheme in Jharkhand following the lines of other state’s free smartphone scheme.



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Jharkhand Free Smartphone Scheme for 28 Lakh Farmers
The state govt. of Jharkhand will launch a Free Smartphone Scheme to provide free mobile phones to around 28 lakh farmers. The announcement of this Free mobile Scheme in Jharkhand will take place in the next budget i.e 2019-20. Farmers will be able to connect to e-NAM which is an online trading platform for agriculture commodities in India. 
e-NAM market facilitates farmers, traders and buyers with online trading in commodities. This market is also helpful in better price discovery and provide facilities for smooth marketing of their produce. The state govt. has recently sent several farmers to Israel so as to enable them to learn to maximize their farming activities with limited resources. 


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Agriculture sector is the largest contributor to the economy and the gross domestic product (GDP) of the country. This sector involves more than 50% of the total population in India and generates direct and indirect employment which is essential for the growth of the economy.

आदरणीय प्रधानमंत्री श्री @narendramodiजी के डिजिटल इंडिया के सपने को पूरा करने के लिए झारखंड को भी डिजिटल होना होगा इसलिए हम अपने 28 लाख किसान भाइयों को मुफ्त मोबाइल देंगे। मोबाइल के जरिए सभी किसान ई-नाम से जुड़ेंगे और सीधे अपना उत्पाद बेच सकेंगे। #NewJharkhand pic.twitter.com/eO7J8jeYJd
— Raghubar Das (@dasraghubar) November 4, 2018

So, it is the responsibility of the state govt. to ensure hi-tech facilities to farmers, make them learn about modern practises to improve the quality and quantity of the forest produce.
Jharkhand Free Smartphone Yojana Farmers
So, providing free smartphones to the farmers is a major step towards the overall development of farmers and the entire agriculture sector. This scheme will realize the vision of “Doubling Farmers income by 2022”.





(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

title: Jharkhand govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Annapurna Yojana to provide meals to poor people. Under this CM Annapoorna Yojana, the state govt. will provide fresh and full tummy meals to hungry people in just Rs. 10. In first phase, govt. will start this pilot project in Ranchi, Dumka, Jamshedpur, Dhanbad, Bokaro and Palamu.
full_text:
Jharkhand govt. has launched Mukhyamantri Annapurna Yojana to provide meals to poor people. Under this CM Annapoorna Yojana, the state govt. will provide fresh and full tummy meals to hungry people in just Rs. 10. In first phase, govt. will start this pilot project in Ranchi, Dumka, Jamshedpur, Dhanbad, Bokaro and Palamu. 
The state govt. has given various gifts to the labourers and safai karamcharis (cleaners) on the occasion of PM Narendra Modi’s Birthday. Govt. will provide 3 to 5 days training to cleaners to bring them into category of skilled labourers. Now all such cleaner workers will would get Rs. 7053 assistance p.m instead of Rs. 6612 p.m. 
All the workers in cleaning occupation will get bicycles and their children in 9th to 12th class will get scholarship for studies. 



(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Jharkhand Mukhyamantri Annapurna Yojana
The state govt. will provide meals to poor hungry people in just Rs. 10 under Mukhyamantri Annapoorna Yojana. This will reduce Infant Mortality Rate (IMR) and will ensure proper nutrition to all especially to women and children. CM Raghubar Das has announced various other measures for the welfare of labourers and safai karmis. 
Now, in case of deaths due to accident, labourers and cleaners would be able to get Rs. 4 lakh assistance from the government. For this all workers and labourers will have to pay premium of Rs. 100 per annum. Any women or men labourers can avail assistance of Rs. 30,000 on the marriage of upto 2 children.


(adsbygoogle=window.adsbygoogle||[]).push({});

Labourers in the unorganized sector will be given skill training. Safai Karamcharis will be put in the category of construction workers. Now these cleaners can make registration in just Rs. 10 and get included in the Labour Welfare Scheme. 

सफाईकर्मी बहनों को साइकिल और उनके बच्चों को 9-12वीं तक की पढ़ाई के लिए छात्रवृत्ति मिलेगी। मुख्यमंत्री अन्नपूर्णा योजना की शुरुआत की जा रही है। इसमें गरीबों को 10 रुपये में शुद्ध और पेटभर भोजन मिलेगा। पहले चरण में ये योजना रांची,दुमका,जमशेदपुर,धनबाद, बोकारो व पलामू से शुरू होगी। pic.twitter.com/VCGuYqVutS
— Raghubar Das (@dasraghubar) September 17, 2018


झारखण्ड के शहरी, स्थानीय निकायों,अस्पतालों से जुड़े सफाईकर्मियों का पद और पैसा दोनों बढ़ाया जायेगा। पायलट प्रोजेक्ट के तहत रांची, दुमका, धनबाद, बोकारो,जमशेदपुर और पलामू में मुख्यमंत्री अन्नपूर्णा योजना के तहत उन्हें 10 रुपये में उत्तम क्वालिटी का भोजन भी दिया जाएगा। #NewJharkhand pic.twitter.com/KNHkTFDBwj
— Raghubar Das (@dasraghubar) September 19, 2018

Jharkhand govt. is working hard for the welfare, development and pride of workers. The state govt. is providing social and economic justice to all safai karamcharis (cleaners), labourers, poor, SC, ST and people from Other Backward Classes.
